	NanJingAutoReport nanJingAutoReport;

    @Autowired
    AlarmCommunityHanJiang alarmCommunityHanJiang;

	@Autowired
	NanJingZhongHuaMenImg nanJingZhongHuaMenImg;

	@Autowired
	NanJingLiuHeO3AutoImg nanJingLiuHeO3AutoImg;

	@Autowired
	NanJingFastAlarm nanJingFastAlarm;

	@Autowired
	YangQuanShiDayAutoReport yangQuanShiDayAutoReport;

	@Autowired
	ShuoZhouDay shuoZhouDay;

	@Autowired
	NanJingJkQAutoImg nanJingJkQAutoImg;

	@Autowired
	ChangZhouShiAutoImg changZhouShiAutoImg;

	@Autowired
	SuQianShiAutoReportDay suQianShiAutoReportDay;

	@Autowired
	SuYuQuMonth suYuQuMonth;

	@Autowired
	SuChengQuMonth suChengQuMonth;

	@Autowired
	HuBinQuMonth huBinQuMonth;

	@Autowired
	JingKaiQuMonth jingKaiQuMonth;

	@Autowired
	YuHuaTaiDayReport yuHuaTaiDayReport;


	@Autowired
	NanJingGuoExcel nanJingGuoExcel;

	@Autowired
	HanAnExcel hanAnExcel;


	@Autowired
	LiuHeWeekReport liuHeWeekReport;

	@Autowired
	JiangNingAutoReport jiangNingAutoReport;

	@Autowired
	LiuHeTVOCMonth liuHeTVOCMonth;

	@Autowired
	JiangBeiMonth jiangBeiMonth;

	@Autowired
	HaiAnGoodExcel haiAnGoodExcel;

	@Autowired
	XingHuaLingDayAutoReport xingHuaLingDayAutoReport;

    @Autowired
    LinFenWeekAutoReport linFenWeekAutoReport;

	@Autowired
	AlarmHanJiangStation alarmHanJiangStation;

	@Autowired
	HaiAnShiWeek haiAnShiWeek;
	@Autowired
	XinZhouWeek xinZhouWeek;

	@Autowired
	TaiAnShiWeek taiAnShiWeek;

	@Autowired
	ZiBoShiAutoReport ziBoShiAutoReport;

	@Autowired
	GaoXinDayAutoReport gaoXinDayAutoReport;

	@Autowired
	GaoXinWeek gaoXinWeek;

	@Autowired
	JiangSuShengAlarm jiangSuShengAlarm;

	@Autowired
	AlarmMsgJingKaiQu alarmMsgJingKaiQu;

	@Autowired
	ZiBoGaoXinWeek ziBoGaoXinWeek;

	@Autowired
	SuQianShiAlarmExcel suQianShiAlarmExcel;

	@Autowired
	AppPM25Excel appPM25Excel;

	@Autowired
	AlarmJiangNingSmallStation alarmJiangNingSmallStation;

	@Autowired
	JiangSuShengPm25 jiangSuShengPm25;

	@Autowired
	AlarmGuLouO3 alarmGuLouO3;

	@Autowired
	PuKouAlarm puKouAlarm;

	@Autowired
	JingKaiQuExcelImg jingKaiQuExcelImg;

	@Autowired
	ZiBoHeightAlarm ziBoHeightAlarm;

    @Autowired
    PuKouWeekReport puKouWeekReport;

	@Autowired
	JiangBeiWeekReport jiangBeiWeekReport;

	@Autowired
	JingKaiQuTenDays jingKaiQuTenDays;

    @Autowired
    ZiBoAlarm ziBoAlarm;

	@Autowired
	GuLouQuDayAutoReport guLouQuDayAutoReport;

	@Autowired
	ChuanYangWeek chuanYangWeek;

	@Autowired
	SuQianShiAlarmImg suQianShiAlarmImg;

	@Autowired
	PingDuMonth pingDuMonth;

	@Autowired
	TaiAnMonth taiAnMonth;

	@Autowired
	GuanXianMonth guanXianMonth;

	@Autowired
	SuQianShiGuoImg suQianShiGuoImg;

	@Autowired
	OneStation oneStation;

	@Autowired
	NanTongTVOC nanTongTVOC;

	@Autowired
	TaiAnAlarmAutoReport taiAnAlarmAutoReport;

	@Autowired
	JiangSuVOC jiangSuVOC;

	@Autowired
	InstertJiangSuMaxInformation instertJiangSuMaxInformation;

	@Autowired
	JiangSuVocMax jiangSuVocMax;

	@Autowired
	InstertJiangSuMaxTime instertJiangSuMaxTime;

	@Autowired
	HaiAnPM10Excel haiAnPM10Excel;

    @Autowired
    JiangSuShengMaxExcel jiangSuShengMaxExcel;

    @Autowired
    XingHuaLingMonth xingHuaLingMonth;

	@Autowired
	LinFenMonth linFenMonth;

	@Autowired
	ExcelOut excelOut;

    @Autowired
    PuKouXun puKouXun;

    @Autowired
    ZongGaiMonth zongGaiMonth;

    @Autowired
    XinZhouMonth xinZhouMonth;

    @Autowired
    GuLouHourCountryAlarm guLouHourCountryAlarm;

	@Autowired
	NanJIngCaiHongQiaoImg nanJIngCaiHongQiaoImg;

	@Autowired
	NanJIngShiWXZhongHuaMenImg nanJIngShiWXZhongHuaMenImg;

	@Value("${pms.upload.path}")
	String pmsUploadPath;

	@Value("${pms.create.path}")
	String pmsCreatePath;

	@Value("${static-file-url}")
	String staticFileUrl;

	//日报导出路径
	@Value("${auto.report.doc.path}")
	String autoReportDocPath;


	@RequestMapping("testPMS")
	public ResponseBean testPMS(@RequestParam("id") String id){
		return new ResponseBean(200,"OK","传入的编号是"+id);
	}


	@PostMapping("uploadPMS")
	public ResponseBean readExeclPMS(
			@RequestParam("upload") MultipartFile file,
			HttpServletResponse response
	) throws Exception {
		if (file.isEmpty()){
			return new ResponseBean(500,"ERROR","文件不能为空");
		}
		String fileName = "PMS"+file.getOriginalFilename();
		String suffix = fileName.substring(fileName.lastIndexOf(".") + 1);
		if (!(suffix.equals("xlsx") || suffix.equals("xls"))){
			return new ResponseBean(500,"ERROR","请上传Excel文件");
		}
		double fileSize = (double) file.getSize() / 1048576;
		if (fileSize > 30) {
			return new ResponseBean(500,"ERROR","单个文件不要超过30M");
		}
		String filePath = pmsUploadPath + "/" + fileName;
		// 转存文件到指定的路径
		try {
			file.transferTo(new File(filePath));
		} catch (IOException e) {

		}


		Workbook wb = ExcelUtil.readExcel(filePath);

		//获取项目基本信息
		Sheet sheet = wb.getSheetAt(0);
		String sheetName=sheet.getSheetName();
		//创建项目列表
		UfZslxjm ufZslxjm = new UfZslxjm();
		//获取项目基本信息
		//获取项目/合同名称
		String projectAndHtName = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 2, 1);
		ufZslxjm.setId("1");
		ufZslxjm.setJhxmmc(projectAndHtName);

		//获取是否为延续项目
		String sfwyxxm = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 2, 5);
		if (sfwyxxm.equals("是")){
			sfwyxxm = "有前期项目设备复用";
		}
		if (sfwyxxm.equals("否")){
			sfwyxxm = "全新项目（无前期项目设备复用）";
		}
		ufZslxjm.setSfwyxxm(sfwyxxm);

		//获取项目编号
		String projectCode = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 3, 1);
		ufZslxjm.setXmbh(projectCode);

		//获取合同编号
		String htbh = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 3, 4);

		//获取客户名称
		String khmc = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 4, 1);

		//获取客户类型
		String khlx = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 4, 4);

		//获取区域：省
		String sheng = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 5, 1);
		ufZslxjm.setXmdqsf(sheng);
		//获取区域：市
		String city = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 5, 3);
		ufZslxjm.setXmdqcs(city);
		//获取区域：区
		String county = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 5, 5);
		ufZslxjm.setXmqyqx(county);

		//获取项目类型
		String xmlx = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 6, 1);
		if (xmlx.equals("采购")){
			xmlx = "购买型";
		}
		if (xmlx.equals("服务")){
			xmlx = "服务型";
		}
		if (xmlx.equals("采购+服务")){
			xmlx = "服务+购买";
		}
		ufZslxjm.setXmlx(xmlx);

		//获取所属行业
		String sshy = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 6, 3);


		//获取成单方式
		String cdfs = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 6, 5);
		ufZslxjm.setXmly(cdfs);

		//获取合同额
		String hte = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 7, 1);

		//获取自有
		String zy = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 7, 3);

		//获取外采
		String wc = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 7, 5);


		//获取当前状态
		String dqzt = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 8, 1);

		if (dqzt.equals("服务期")){
			dqzt = "正式立项";
		}
		if (dqzt.equals("建设期")){
			dqzt = "正式立项";
		}
		if (dqzt.equals("完结")){
			dqzt = "";
		}
		ufZslxjm.setXmzt(dqzt);

		//项目机会规模 合同额
		ufZslxjm.setJhgmwy(hte);


		//部门赋值
		ufZslxjm.setSssyb("长三角事业部");
		//获取建设期（月）
		String jsq = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 8, 3);

		//获取服务期/运维期
		String fwq = ExcelUtil.getCellValue(wb, sheetName, 8, 5);
		List<String> mainList=new ArrayList<>();

		//项目人员信息
		String title[] = {"type","name","startTime","endTime","gszb","remark"};

		int rowItem = ExcelUtil.findRow(sheet, "三、项目组成") -1;

		List<Map<String, String>> itemList = ExcelUtil.getCellValueList(wb, sheetName, 12, rowItem,6, title);
		List<PersonGsVo> personGsVoList=new ArrayList<>();
		List<String> xmjlList= new ArrayList<>();
		for (Map<String, String> person : itemList) {
			if(person != null && person.size() > 0){
				String type = person.get("type") + "";
				PersonGsVo personGsVo = new PersonGsVo();
				if(type.contains("项目经理")){
					xmjlList.add(person.get("name")+"");
					type = "项目岗";
				}
				if(type.equals("咨询顾问")){
					type = "咨询岗";
				}
				if(type.equals("销售经理")){
					ufZslxjm.setXsjl(person.get("name"));
					continue;
				}
				person.put("type",type);

				personGsVo.setId("1");
				personGsVo.setSjid("1");
				personGsVo.setGw(type);
				personGsVo.setXmbm(projectCode);
				personGsVo.setXmmc(projectAndHtName);
				personGsVo.setXm(person.get("name"));
				if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(person.get("gszb")+"") && !person.get("gszb").equals("%")){
					double gszb = Double.parseDouble(person.get("gszb") + "");
					BigDecimal b = new BigDecimal(gszb);
					double sum = b.setScale(1, BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_UP).doubleValue();
					personGsVo.setGszb(String.format("%.1f", sum));
				}
				personGsVoList.add(personGsVo);
			}
		}
		//赋值项目经理
		ufZslxjm.setXmjl(xmjlList.get(0));
		com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<PersonGsVo> utli1=new com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<>(PersonGsVo.class);
		utli1.exportExcel(personGsVoList,"工时台账"+projectCode);
		mainList.add(pmsCreatePath+"/工时台账"+projectCode+".xlsx");

		//项目组成信息
		String title1[] = {"type","zcbf","num","price","glhtbh","remark"};
		int rowReturned = ExcelUtil.findRow(sheet, "四、回款进度") -1;
		List<Map<String, String>> returnedList  = ExcelUtil.getCellValueList(wb, sheetName, rowItem+3, rowReturned,6, title1);
		List<SblyVo> sblyVoList=new ArrayList<>();
		List<Zyyjtrdt1Vo> zyyjtrdt1VoList=new ArrayList<>();
		List<List<String>> nodeList1=new ArrayList<>();
		List<List<String>> nodeList2=new ArrayList<>();
		BigDecimal sum = new BigDecimal("0");

		//采购信息
		List<Map<String,Object>> cgxxList=new ArrayList<>();
		for (Map<String, String> returned : returnedList) {
			ArrayList<String> list = new ArrayList<>();
			ArrayList<String> list1 = new ArrayList<>();
			list.add("1");
			list1.add("1");
			list1.add(null);
			String type = returned.get("type") + "";
			if(!type.equals("大气-硬件-服务") && !type.equals("外采-大气运维服务")){
				continue;
			}
			if(type.equals("大气-硬件-服务")){
				type = "气设备";
			}
			if(type.equals("外采-大气运维服务")){
				Map<String, Object> wcywMap = new HashMap<>();
				//类型
				wcywMap.put("type","分包2-外采服务");
				//采购合同编号
				wcywMap.put("cghtbh",returned.get("glhtbh"));
				//供应商名称
				wcywMap.put("gysmc",returned.get("zcbf"));
				//总价
				wcywMap.put("zj",returned.get("price"));
				//项目编号
				wcywMap.put("projectCode",projectCode);

				//合同总金额
                wcywMap.put("hte",hte);

                cgxxList.add(wcywMap);
                continue;
			}
			returned.put("type",type);
			list.add(type);
			list.add(null);
			list.add(returned.get("num"));
			list.add(null);
			SblyVo sblyVo = new SblyVo();
			String zcbf = returned.get("zcbf") + "";
			String sbcs = "";
			if(zcbf.contains("七参数") || zcbf.contains("7参")){
				sbcs="PM25,PM10,O3,NO2,CO,SO2,TVOC";
			}
			if(zcbf.equals("六参数")){
				sbcs="PM25,PM10,O3,NO2,CO,SO2";
			}
			if(zcbf.equals("单参数")){
				sbcs="PM25";
			}
			if(zcbf.equals("七参移动设备") || zcbf.equals("7参移动设备采购") ){
				sbcs="PM25,PM10,O3,NO2,CO,SO2,TVOC";
				sblyVo.setMc("移动设备");
			}
			if(zcbf.contains("7参数便携移动空气质量检测仪")){
				sbcs="PM25,PM10,O3,NO2,CO,SO2,TVOC";
				sblyVo.setMc("移动设备");
			}
			list.add(sbcs);
			list.add(null);
			nodeList1.add(list);
			String price = returned.get("price");
			list.add(price);
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(price)){
				sum  = sum.add( new BigDecimal(price));
			}

//            returned.put("zcbf",zcbf);
			list1.add(sbcs);
			list1.add(null);
			list1.add(returned.get("num"));
			list1.add(null);
			list1.add(type);
			nodeList2.add(list1);

			sblyVo.setSblx(type);
			sblyVo.setSjsl(returned.get("num"));
			sblyVo.setCs(zcbf);
			//取项目基本信息合同编号
			sblyVo.setHtbh(returned.get("glhtbh"));
			//取上面项目编号
			sblyVo.setXmbh(projectCode);
			sblyVoList.add(sblyVo);


			//自有硬件投入明细表
			Zyyjtrdt1Vo zyyjtrdt1Vo = new Zyyjtrdt1Vo();
			zyyjtrdt1Vo.setSbcs(zcbf);
			zyyjtrdt1Vo.setSblx(type);
			zyyjtrdt1Vo.setSjsl(returned.get("num"));
			zyyjtrdt1VoList.add(zyyjtrdt1Vo);
		}

		//处理采购信息
        if(cgxxList != null && cgxxList.size() > 0){
            for (int i = 0; i < cgxxList.size(); i++) {
                List<List<String>> cgList1=new ArrayList<>();
                //主表信息
                List<String> zbList=new ArrayList<>();
                zbList.add("1");
                zbList.add(null);
                zbList.add(cgxxList.get(i).get("projectCode")+"");
                zbList.add(cgxxList.get(i).get("cghtbh")+"");
                zbList.add(null);
                zbList.add(cgxxList.get(i).get("gysmc")+"");
                cgList1.add(zbList);
                List<List<String>> cgList2=new ArrayList<>();
                //明细表数据
                List<String> dt1List=new ArrayList<>();
                dt1List.add("1");
                dt1List.add(cgxxList.get(i).get("type")+"");
                dt1List.add(cgxxList.get(i).get("zj")+"");
                cgList2.add(dt1List);

                String header1[] = {"ID","数据ID","项目编号","采购合同","合同名称","供应商名称"};
                String header2[] = {"MAINID","分类","总价"};

                XSSFWorkbook cgSheet = new XSSFWorkbook();
                String cgxxPath=pmsCreatePath+"/采购信息-"+i+projectCode+".xlsx";
                FileOutputStream outputStream1 = new FileOutputStream(cgxxPath);

                ExcelUtil.exportExcel(cgSheet,0,"主表",header1,cgList1,outputStream1);
                ExcelUtil.exportExcel(cgSheet,1,"明细1",header2,cgList2,outputStream1);


                cgSheet.write(outputStream1);
                outputStream1.close();
            }
        }




		//自有硬件投入
		String returnHeader1[] = {"ID","数据ID","项目编号"};
		List<String> returnList1 = new ArrayList<>();
		returnList1.add("1");
		returnList1.add(null);
		returnList1.add(projectCode);
		XSSFWorkbook sheets1 = new XSSFWorkbook();
		String returnPath1=pmsCreatePath+"/自有硬件投入"+projectCode+".xlsx";
		FileOutputStream outputStream1 = new FileOutputStream(returnPath1);
		List<List<String>> resultReturn1 = new ArrayList<>();
		resultReturn1.add(returnList1);
		String retrunHeader3[] = {"MAINID","设备类型","预计数量","实际数量","剩余数量","设备参数","预计成本投入","实际成本投入"};
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets1,0,"主表",returnHeader1,resultReturn1,outputStream1);
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets1,1,"明细1",retrunHeader3,nodeList1,outputStream1);

		sheets1.write(outputStream1);
		outputStream1.close();
		mainList.add(pmsCreatePath+"/自有硬件投入"+projectCode+".xlsx");


		//设备来源
		String returnHeader4[] = {"ID","数据ID","项目编号","合同编号","设备来源","投入时间"};
		List<String> returnList2 = new ArrayList<>();
		returnList2.add("1");
		returnList2.add(null);
		returnList2.add(projectCode);
		returnList2.add(htbh);
		returnList2.add(null);
		returnList2.add(null);
		XSSFWorkbook sheets2 = new XSSFWorkbook();
		String returnPath2=pmsCreatePath+"/设备来源"+projectCode+".xlsx";
		FileOutputStream outputStream2 = new FileOutputStream(returnPath2);
		List<List<String>> resultReturn2 = new ArrayList<>();
		resultReturn2.add(returnList2);
		String returnHeader5[] = {"MAINID","名称","参数","计划投入","实际数量","剩余数量","设备类型"};
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets2,0,"主表",returnHeader4,resultReturn2,outputStream2);
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets2,1,"明细1",returnHeader5,nodeList2,outputStream2);

		sheets2.write(outputStream2);
		outputStream2.close();
		mainList.add(pmsCreatePath+"/设备来源"+projectCode+".xlsx");

//        com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<SblyVo> util2=new com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<>(SblyVo.class);
//        util2.exportExcel(sblyVoList,"设备来源"+projectCode);
//        mainList.add("设备来源"+projectCode+".xlsx");

		//自有硬件投入
		ZyyjtrVo zyyjtrVo = new ZyyjtrVo();
		zyyjtrVo.setXmbh(projectCode);
		zyyjtrVo.setSjcbtr(sum+"");
//        com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<ZyyjtrVo> util3=new com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<>(ZyyjtrVo.class);
		List<ZyyjtrVo> list=new ArrayList<>();
		list.add(zyyjtrVo);
//        util3.exportExcel(list,"自有硬件投入"+projectCode);
//        mainList.add("自有硬件投入"+projectCode+".xlsx");

//        com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<Zyyjtrdt1Vo> util4=new com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<>(Zyyjtrdt1Vo.class);
//        util4.exportExcel(zyyjtrdt1VoList,"自有硬件投入明细表1"+projectCode);
//        mainList.add("自有硬件投入明细表1"+projectCode+".xlsx");


		//回款进度
		String title2[] = {"node","htTime","yjTime","sjTime","yhje","shje"};
		int rowSchedule = ExcelUtil.findRow(sheet, "五、项目进度") -1;
		List<Map<String, String>> scheduleList  = ExcelUtil.getCellValueList(wb, sheetName, rowReturned+3, rowSchedule,6, title2);
		List<ReturnNodeVo> returnNodeVoList=new ArrayList<>();
		List<List<String>> nodeList=new ArrayList<>();
		List<Double> shjeList=new ArrayList<>(); //实回金额总额
		DateTimeFormatter dateTimeFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd");
		for (Map<String, String> map : scheduleList) {
			List<String> list1=new ArrayList<>();
			list1.add("1");
			String node = "";
			//付款条件
			if(map.get("node").indexOf(",") != -1){
				String fktj = map.get("node").split(",")[1] +"";
				list1.add(fktj);
				//回款其次
				 node = map.get("node").split(",")[0] + "回款";
			}else {
				//回款其次
				node = map.get("node")+ "回款";
				list1.add(null);
			}

			//合同回款时间
			String htTime = map.get("htTime") + "";
			list1.add(htTime);
			//预计完成时间
			String yjTime = map.get("yjTime") + "";
			list1.add(yjTime);
			//实际回款时间
			String sjTime = map.get("sjTime") + "";
			list1.add(sjTime);

			//如果实际金额等于空或者小于等于0未回状态
			if(StringUtils.isEmpty(map.get("shje"))){
				list1.add("未回");
			}else {
				list1.add("已回");
			}
			//获取系统时间
			LocalDate now = LocalDate.now();
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(sjTime) && !StringUtils.isEmpty(htTime)){
				LocalDate endTime = LocalDate.parse(sjTime, dateTimeFormatter);
				System.out.println(htTime);
				LocalDate startTime = LocalDate.parse(htTime, dateTimeFormatter);
				long between = ChronoUnit.DAYS.between(startTime, endTime);
				if(between > 0){
					list1.add("已逾期");
				}else {
					list1.add("未逾期");
				}
			}else {
				if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(htTime)){
					LocalDate startTime = LocalDate.parse(htTime, dateTimeFormatter);
					long between = ChronoUnit.DAYS.between(startTime, now);
					if(between > 0){
						list1.add("已逾期");
					}else {
						list1.add("未逾期");
					}
				}else {
					list1.add("未逾期");
				}

			}


			//list1.add(null);
			//金额
			String yhje = map.get("yhje") + "";
			list1.add(yhje);
			//已回款
			String shje = map.get("shje") + "";
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(shje)){
				shjeList.add(Double.parseDouble(shje));
			}
			list1.add(shje);
			list1.add(null);
			list1.add(null);
			list1.add(node);
			list1.add(null);
			nodeList.add(list1);
			ReturnNodeVo returnNodeVo = new ReturnNodeVo();
			returnNodeVo.setHkqc(node);
			returnNodeVo.setHthksj(htTime);
			returnNodeVo.setJhwcrq(yjTime);
			returnNodeVo.setSjhksj(sjTime);
			returnNodeVo.setJe(yhje);
			returnNodeVo.setYhk(shje);
			returnNodeVo.setXmbh(projectCode);
			returnNodeVoList.add(returnNodeVo);
		}
//    com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<ReturnNodeVo> util5=new com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<>(ReturnNodeVo.class);
////    util5.exportExcel(returnNodeVoList,"回款"+projectCode);
		//回款
		String returnHeader[] = {"ID","数据ID","合同编号","项目编号","合同名称"};
		List<String> returnList=new ArrayList<>();
		returnList.add("1");
		returnList.add(null);
		returnList.add(htbh);
		returnList.add(projectCode);
		returnList.add(projectAndHtName);
		XSSFWorkbook sheets = new XSSFWorkbook();
		String returnPath=pmsCreatePath+"/回款"+projectCode+".xlsx";
		File file3 = new File(returnPath);
		OutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(returnPath);
		List<List<String>>  resultReturn = new ArrayList<>();
		resultReturn.add(returnList);
		String returnHeader2[] = {"MAINID","付款条件","合同回款时间"  ,"计划回款时间",  "实际回款时间",  "状态"  ,"是否逾期"  ,"金额"  ,"已回款"  ,"未回款"  ,"备注",  "回款期次"  ,"已开票"};
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets,0,"主表",returnHeader,resultReturn,outputStream);
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets,1,"明细1",returnHeader2,nodeList,outputStream);
		//原理就是将所有的数据一起写入，然后再关闭输入流。
		sheets.write(outputStream);
		outputStream.close();
		mainList.add(pmsCreatePath+"/回款"+projectCode+".xlsx");
		//项目进度
		String title3[] = {"node","htTime","yjTime","sjTime","sm"};
		int rowProgress = ExcelUtil.findRow(sheet, "六、运维/外采付款记录") -1;
		List<Map<String, String>> progressList  = ExcelUtil.getCellValueList(wb, sheetName, rowSchedule+3, rowProgress,5, title3);
		List<JihuaVo> jihuaVoList=new ArrayList<>();
		List<List<String>> nodeList3=new ArrayList<>();
		for (Map<String, String> item : progressList) {
			List<String> list3 = new ArrayList<>();
			String node = item.get("node") + "";
			if (node.equals("中标")){
				if(!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){
					ufZslxjm.setZbggrqs(item.get("sjTime"));
				}
			}
			if (node.equals("商机立项")){
				node = "项目商机立项";
			}
			if(node.equals("招标公告") ){
				if(!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){
					//项目列表信息 招标公告日期
					ufZslxjm.setZbggrq(item.get("sjTime")+"");
				}

			}
			if (node.equals("招标公告") || node.equals("开标")){
				continue;
			}
			if (node.equals("开标")){
				if(!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")) {
					//预计开标日期
					ufZslxjm.setYjkbrq(item.get("sjTime") + "");
				}

			}
			if (node.equals("备货")){
				node = "备货申请";
			}
			if (node.equals("中标")){
				node = "招投标";
			}
			if (node.equals("正式立项")){
				node = "正式立项";
			}
			if (node.equals("合同签订")){
				node = "合同签订";
			}
			if (node.equals("到货签收")){
				node = "货物签收";
			}
			if (node.equals("项目验收")){
				node = "项目验收";
			}
			if (node.equals("服务期开始")){
				node = "服务开始确认";
				if(!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")) {
					//项目服务期开始时间
					ufZslxjm.setXmfwqkssj(item.get("sjTime")+"");
				}

			}
			if(node.contains("应用证明")){
				node = "年度审计询证";
			}
			if (node.equals("服务期结束")){
				node = "服务完结确认";
				if(!item.get("htTime").equals("-")) {
					//项目服务期结束时间
					ufZslxjm.setXmfwqsj(item.get("htTime")+"");
				}
			}
			JihuaVo jihuaVo = new JihuaVo();
			jihuaVo.setYjjd(node);
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("htTime")) && !item.get("htTime").equals("-")){
				jihuaVo.setHtsjz(item.get("htTime"));
			}
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("yjTime")) && !item.get("yjTime").equals("-")){
				jihuaVo.setJhsjz(item.get("yjTime"));
			}
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("sjTime")) && !item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){
				jihuaVo.setSjsjz(item.get("sjTime"));
			}
			jihuaVo.setBz(item.get("sm"));
			jihuaVoList.add(jihuaVo);

			list3.add("1");
			list3.add(node);
			list3.add(null);

			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("yjTime")) && !item.get("yjTime").equals("-")){
				list3.add(item.get("yjTime"));
			}else {
				list3.add(null);
			}
			list3.add(null);
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("htTime")) && !item.get("htTime").equals("-")){
				list3.add(item.get("htTime"));
			}else {
				list3.add(null);
			}

			list3.add(null);
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("sjTime")) && !item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){
				list3.add(item.get("sjTime"));
			}else {
				list3.add(null);
			}
			list3.add(null);

            if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("sjTime"))){
            	list3.add("完成");
			}else if(StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("htTime")) && StringUtils.isEmpty(item.get("sjTime"))){
				list3.add(null);
			}else {
				list3.add("正常");
			}


            //实际时间
			String sjTime = item.get("sjTime") + "";
            //合同时间
			String htTime = item.get("htTime") + "";
			if(StringUtils.isEmpty(htTime) || htTime.equals(" ") || htTime == null || htTime.equals("- ")){
				list3.add(null);
			}
			if(StringUtils.isEmpty(sjTime) || sjTime.equals("-")){
				list3.add(null);
			}

			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(htTime) && !htTime.equals("-") && !StringUtils.isEmpty(sjTime) && !sjTime.equals("-")){
				LocalDate startTime = LocalDate.parse(htTime, dateTimeFormatter);
				LocalDate endTime = LocalDate.parse(sjTime, dateTimeFormatter);

				long between = ChronoUnit.DAYS.between(startTime, endTime);
				if(between > 0){
					list3.add("已逾期");
				}else if( between <= 0){
					list3.add("未逾期");
				}
			}

			nodeList3.add(list3);
		}
		for (ReturnNodeVo returnNodeVo : returnNodeVoList) {
			List<String> list3 = new ArrayList<>();
			list3.add("1");
			list3.add(returnNodeVo.getHkqc());
			list3.add(null);
			list3.add(returnNodeVo.getJhwcrq());
			list3.add(null);
			list3.add(returnNodeVo.getHthksj());
			list3.add(null);
			list3.add(returnNodeVo.getSjhksj());
			list3.add(returnNodeVo.getBz());
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(returnNodeVo.getSjhksj())){
				list3.add("完成");
			}else if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(returnNodeVo.getHthksj())){
				list3.add("正常");
			}else {
				list3.add(null);
			}
			String htTime = returnNodeVo.getHthksj();
			String sjTime = returnNodeVo.getSjhksj();
			if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(htTime) && !htTime.equals("-") && !StringUtils.isEmpty(sjTime) && !sjTime.equals("-")){
				LocalDate startTime = LocalDate.parse(htTime.trim(), dateTimeFormatter);
				LocalDate endTime = LocalDate.parse(sjTime, dateTimeFormatter);

				long between = ChronoUnit.DAYS.between(startTime, endTime);
				if(between > 0){
					list3.add("已逾期");
				}else if( between <= 0){
					list3.add("未逾期");
				}
			}
			nodeList3.add(list3);
		}

		String returnHeader6[] = {"ID","数据ID","合同编号","项目编号"};
		List<String> returnList3 = new ArrayList<>();
		returnList3.add("1");
		returnList3.add(null);
		returnList3.add(htbh);
		returnList3.add(projectCode);
		XSSFWorkbook sheets3 = new XSSFWorkbook();

		resultReturn3.add(returnList3);
		String returnHeader7[] = {"MAINID","一级节点","计划时间起","计划时间止","合同时间起","合同时间止","实际时间起","实际时间止","备注","状态","是否逾期"};
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets3,0,"主表",returnHeader6,resultReturn3,outputStream3);
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets3,1,"明细1",returnHeader7,nodeList3,outputStream3);

		sheets3.write(outputStream3);
		outputStream3.close();
		mainList.add(pmsCreatePath+"/计划"+projectCode+".xlsx");

		//项目台账
		String xmtzReturnHeader[] = {"ID","项目编号","项目名称","是否为延续项目","机会项目描述","销售经理","项目经理","相关依据","机会项目规模（万元）","预期成单时间","机会信息表","备注","项目状态","公司主体","是否属于商机立项","项目来源","机会项目全称","机会项目概述","招标公告日期","预计开标日期","中标公告日期","项目服务期开始时间","项目服务期终止时间","信息表","机会项目终止原因","申请部门","申请人","是否招投标","项目级别","项目地区（省份）","项目地区（城市）","项目地区（区县）","财务U8编号","项目可见范围-部门","关联具体部门","所属公司","所属事业部","项目可见范围-其他人员"};
		List<String> xmtzReturnList = new ArrayList<>();
		xmtzReturnList.add("1");
		xmtzReturnList.add(projectCode);
		xmtzReturnList.add(projectAndHtName);
		xmtzReturnList.add(sfwyxxm);
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		StringBuffer xsname = new StringBuffer();
		for (Map<String,String> person : itemList){
			if (person != null && person.size() > 0){
				String type = person.get("type") + "";
				if (type.equals("销售经理")){
					xsname.append(person.get("name"));
				}
			}
		}
		xmtzReturnList.add(xsname.toString());

		xmtzReturnList.add(xmjlList.get(0));
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		xmtzReturnList.add(hte);
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		xmtzReturnList.add(dqzt);
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		xmtzReturnList.add(cdfs);
		xmtzReturnList.add(projectAndHtName);
		xmtzReturnList.add(null);
		for (Map<String, String> item : progressList) {
			List<String> tempList = new ArrayList<>();
			String node = item.get("node") + "";
			if (node.equals("招标公告")){
				if (!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){
					tempList.add(item.get("sjTime")+"");
				}else {
					tempList.add(null);
				}
			}
			if (node.equals("开标")){
				if (!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){
					tempList.add(item.get("sjTime")+"");
				}else {
					tempList.add(null);
				}
			}
			if (node.equals("中标")){
				if (!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){

				}else {

				}
			}
			if (node.equals("服务期开始")){

				}else {

				}
			}
			if (node.equals("服务期结束")){
				if (!item.get("sjTime").equals("-")){

		}

		xmtzReturnList.add(null);

		}else {

		}

		xmtzReturnList.add(null);

		XSSFWorkbook sheets5 = new XSSFWorkbook();

		FileOutputStream outputStream4 = new FileOutputStream(xmtzRetrunPath);
		List<List<String>>	xmtzResultReturn = new ArrayList<>();
		xmtzResultReturn.add(xmtzReturnList);
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets5,0,"主表",xmtzReturnHeader,xmtzResultReturn,outputStream4);

		sheets5.write(outputStream4);
		outputStream4.close();

//        util6.exportExcel(jihuaVoList,"项目进度"+projectCode);
////        mainList.add("项目进度"+projectCode+".xlsx");

		//获取最后一行
		int lastRowNum = sheet.getLastRowNum() ;
		//运维/外采付款记录
		String title4[] = {"htName","htCode","fktj","yfsj","sfsj","sm"};
		List<Map<String, String>> operationList  = ExcelUtil.getCellValueList(wb, sheetName, rowProgress+3, lastRowNum,6, title4);
		PayDetailVo payDetailVo = new PayDetailVo();
		payDetailVo.setXmbh(projectCode);
		List<PayDetaildt1Vo> payDetaildt1Vos=new ArrayList<>();
		for (int i = 0; i < operationList.size(); i++) {
			List<String> fkmxList=new ArrayList<>();
			Map<String, String> item = operationList.get(i);
			String htName = item.get("htName") + "";
			String htCode = item.get("htCode") + "";
			String fktj = item.get("fktj") + "";
			String yfsj = item.get("yfsj") + "";
			String sfsj = item.get("sfsj") + "";
			String sm = item.get("sm") + "";
			PayDetaildt1Vo payDetaildt1Vo = new PayDetaildt1Vo();
			payDetaildt1Vo.setHtmc(htName);
			payDetaildt1Vo.setFbhtbh(htCode);
			payDetaildt1Vos.add(payDetaildt1Vo);

			//生成主表数据
			fkmxList.add("1");
			fkmxList.add(null);
			fkmxList.add(projectCode);
			fkmxList.add(null);
			fkmxList.add(sfsj);
			XSSFWorkbook sheets4 = new XSSFWorkbook();
			String fkmxPath = pmsCreatePath+"/付款明细"+i+"--"+projectCode+".xlsx";
			FileOutputStream fkmxStream3 = new FileOutputStream(fkmxPath);

			List<List<String>> list1=new ArrayList<>();
			list1.add(fkmxList);
			ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets4,0,"主表",fkmxHeader,list1,fkmxStream3);

			List<String> dt1List=new ArrayList<>();


			dt1List.add("1");
			dt1List.add(htCode);
			dt1List.add(htName);
			dt1List.add(null);
			dt1List.add(null);

			List<List<String>> dt1Lists=new ArrayList<>();
			dt1Lists.add(dt1List);
			String fkmxdt1Header[] = {"MAINID","合同编号","合同名称","类型","供应商名称（废弃）"};
			ExcelUtil.exportExcel(sheets4,1,"明细表1",fkmxdt1Header,dt1Lists,fkmxStream3);

			//原理就是将所有的数据一起写入，然后再关闭输入流。
			sheets4.write(fkmxStream3);
			outputStream.close();
			mainList.add(fkmxPath);
		}

//        com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<PayDetaildt1Vo> util7=new com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<>(PayDetaildt1Vo.class);
//        util7.exportExcel(payDetaildt1Vos,"运维"+projectCode);
//        mainList.add("运维"+projectCode+".xlsx");

		com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<UfZslxjm> util = new com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.poi.ExcelUtil<>(UfZslxjm.class);
		List<UfZslxjm> ufZslxjms = new ArrayList<>();
		ufZslxjms.add(ufZslxjm);
		util.exportExcel(ufZslxjms,"项目列表"+projectCode);
		mainList.add(pmsCreatePath+"/项目列表"+projectCode+".xlsx");

		//合同
		XSSFWorkbook htSheet = new XSSFWorkbook();
		String htPath = pmsCreatePath+"/合同"+projectCode+".xlsx";
		mainList.add(pmsCreatePath+"/合同"+projectCode+".xlsx");
		//File htFile = new File(htPath);
		FileOutputStream htStream = new FileOutputStream(htPath);
		List<List<String>> resultHt = new ArrayList<>();

		String htHeader7[] = {"ID","数据ID","项目编号","合同编号","合同名称","客户名称","合同类型","合同总金额","已收款","未回款","已开票"};
		List<String> htList=new ArrayList<>();
		htList.add("1");
		htList.add("1");
		htList.add(projectCode);
		htList.add(htbh);
		htList.add(projectAndHtName);
		htList.add(khmc);
		htList.add(null);
		htList.add(hte);
		//已收款
		Double sumYield = shjeList.stream().collect(Collectors.summarizingDouble(value -> value)).getSum();
		htList.add(sumYield+"");
        if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(hte)){
			htList.add(Double.parseDouble(hte) - sumYield+"");
		}else {
			htList.add(null);
		}


		htList.add( sumYield+"");
		resultHt.add(htList);
		ExcelUtil.exportExcel(htSheet,0,"主表",htHeader7,resultHt,htStream);
		htSheet.write(htStream);
		htStream.close();

		String name=pmsCreatePath+"/zip/"+projectCode+"PMS历史数据"+".zip";
		ZipCompressor zc = new ZipCompressor(name);

		String[] strings = new String[mainList.size()];
		mainList.toArray(strings);
		try {
			zc.compress(strings);
			//File  file2=new File(name);
			//ZipCompressor.downloadZip(file2,null);
		} catch (IOException e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}finally {
		}
		String fileNames = projectCode+"-"+projectAndHtName+"PMS历史数据"+".zip";
		String docxUrl = staticFileUrl+"/pms/"+projectCode+"-"+projectAndHtName+"PMS历史数据"+".zip";
		String textMsg = "{ \"msgtype\": \"link\", " + "\"link\":{\"text\": \"" + fileNames + "\"," + "\"title\":\""
				+ fileNames + "\"," + "\"picUrl\":\"\"," + "\"messageUrl\":\"" + docxUrl + "\"}}";
		String webbookUrl = "https://oapi.dingtalk.com/robot/send?access_token=2dd5332e4cd064d4732fe5a7ab14e4654be801900349b1d73b35bfd41f10c288";

		//HttpUtils.sendPost_DingTalk(webbookUrl,textMsg);

		return new ResponseBean(HttpStatus.OK.value(),"生成PMS数据成功",null);
	}


	/**
	 * 测试类
	 */
	public void test(){

	}

	/**
	 * 测试Ip
	 *
	 * @return
	 */
	@ApiOperation("测试Ip")
	@RequestMapping("/testIp")
	public HashMap<String, Object> testIp(HttpServletRequest request){
		HashMap<String, Object> map = new HashMap<>();
		map.put("user",request.getRemoteUser());
		map.put("addr",request.getRemoteAddr());
		map.put("host",request.getRemoteHost());
		map.put("port",request.getRemotePort());
		return  map;
	}

	/**
	 * 查找所有用户
	 *
	 * @return
	 */
	@ApiOperation("测试用接口")
	@RequestMapping("/getUserList")
	public List<Map<String, Object>> getUserList(
			@RequestParam(value="id",required = false) String id) {
		List<Map<String, Object>> list = testService.getUserList(id);
		return list;
	}

	/**
	 * 测试OSS
	 *
	 * @return
	 */
	@ApiOperation("测试OSS")
	@RequestMapping("/testoss")
	public String testoss() {
		String returnUrl = autoReportDocPath+"/doc/jiangsusheng/nanjingshi/liuhequ/六合周报2022.5.30-2022.6.5.docx";// 导出地址

		String ossUrl = UploadUtil.uploadToOss(returnUrl);

		return ossUrl;
	}


	@ApiOperation("生成海安市报警统计报告")
	@RequestMapping("/genHaianshiReport")
	public Map<String, Object> genHaianshiReport() {
		Map<String,Object> resultMap = new HashMap<String,Object>();
		try {
			alarmMsgHaiAnAlarm.alarm();
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "true");
			resultMap.put("msg","报告生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "false");
			resultMap.put("msg", e.getMessage());
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("生成六合周报报告")
	@RequestMapping("/genLiuHeWeekReport")
	public Map<String, Object> genLiuHeWeekReport() {
		Map<String,Object> resultMap = new HashMap<String,Object>();
		try {
			String ossUrl = liuHeWeekReport.autoReport();
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "true");
			resultMap.put("msg","报告生成成功");
			resultMap.put("url",ossUrl);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "false");
			resultMap.put("msg", e.getMessage());
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("报警测试")
	@RequestMapping("/genAlarm")
	public Map<String, Object> baojin() {
		Map<String,Object> resultMap = new HashMap<String,Object>();
		try {
			alarm.getO3DataOne();
			alarm.getO3DataTwo();
			alarm.getMsgData();
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "true");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "false");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
			e.printStackTrace();
		}

		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("鼓楼超时报警反馈")
	@RequestMapping("/GuLouFeedBackOverTime")
	public Map<String,Object> GuLouFeedBackOverTime(){
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = new HashMap<String,Object>();
		try {
			guLouFeedBackOverTime.alarmGulou10H();
			guLouFeedBackOverTime.alarmGulou17H();
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "true");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "false");
			resultMap.put("msg", e.getMessage());
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@RequestMapping("/HongLanMonth")
	public Map<String, Object> HongLanMonth() {
		Map<String,Object> resultMap = new HashMap<String,Object>();
		try {
			hongLanTownMonth.getReportDoc();
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "true");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			resultMap.put("isSuccess", "false");
			resultMap.put("msg", e.getMessage());
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	public Map<String, Object> yangQuanGridWeekAutoReport() {

		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			yangQuanGridWeekAutoReport.getReportDoc();
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("江苏省项目网格化报告")
	@RequestMapping("/jiangSuShengAlarm")
	public Map<String, Object> jiangSuShengAlarm(
			@RequestParam("startTime") String startTime,
			@RequestParam("endTime") String endTime,
			@RequestParam("cityId") String cityId,
			@RequestParam("timeType") String timeType,
			@RequestParam(value="pollutantId",defaultValue = "134004") String pollutantId
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
            String reportDoc = jiangSuShengAlarm.getReportDoc(startTime, endTime, cityId, timeType,pollutantId);
            resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成成功");
			resultMap.put("url",reportDoc);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}


	@ApiOperation("淄博市高新区空气质量周报")
	@RequestMapping("/gaoXinWeek")
	public Map<String, Object> gaoXinWeek() {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			gaoXinWeek.getReportDoc();
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("经开区小标站高值预警")
	@RequestMapping("/alarmMsgJingKaiQu")
	public Map<String, Object> alarmMsgJingKaiQu() {

		} catch (Exception e) {

			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	/**
	 * 任务状态 待反馈 1 已反馈 2 已关闭 3
	 * 点位报警 3 网格报警 2 实时报警 1
	 * @return
	 * @throws Exception
	 */
	@GetMapping("getAlarmList")
	public  List<Map<String,Object>> getAlarmList(
			@RequestParam("eventStatus") String eventStatus,
			@RequestParam("alarmType") String alarmType,
			@RequestParam("startTime") String startTime,
			@RequestParam("endTime") String endTime,
			@RequestParam("pollId") String pollId,
			@RequestParam("projectCode") String projectCode,
			@RequestParam("admId") String admId,
			@RequestParam("admLevel") String admLevel
	) throws Exception {
		String url = "https://api-daily-supervision.airqualitychina.cn:9998/api/events";
		JsonObject jsonPrarms = new JsonObject();
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("token","qiYrxXEv5mJPW6-dU5_wQZic0NaiBf_2dNqAal9UUAtpfq9HmIB73P0AoeVE8E4ahr4PzJWr-oZ5x_W09VV6OhjDAAOLbexfvOjNqKZtpI1-ONiwcX89V8nj8e7bRVgBHcAOU2H21RkrAU4lJE6_P39ymZVZZ_2J8p3yx1Of375zlklApzleErrhNUHbxZPYMlkYbf0K2qKxlXuCvyBCnA9840RppIl0QPhrBpEi2xGUhyPey2knMTDaNT8nhefZ1fWNTtq7KUvmKK72Ftv6TQ==");
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("devsite_prop_code","");
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("event_status",eventStatus);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("pollutant_id",pollId);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("adm_id",admId);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("adm_level",admLevel);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("page","1");
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("page_size","100000");
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("start_datetime",startTime);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("end_datetime",endTime);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("event_type_id",alarmType);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("project_code",projectCode);
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("feedback_status","");
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("subgrid_code","");
		String resultStr = HttpUtils.HttpGet(url,jsonPrarms);

		Gson gson = new Gson();
		JsonObject fromJson = gson.fromJson(resultStr,JsonObject.class);
		JsonArray jsonList =  fromJson.getAsJsonObject().get("result").getAsJsonArray();
		List<Map<String,Object>> resultList = new ArrayList<>();

		int k = 1;
		for (int i = 0; i <jsonList.size() ; i++) {
			Map<String,Object> arlarmsMap = new HashMap<>();
			arlarmsMap.put("serial",k++);
			//获取任务编号
			String id = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("id").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("id",id);
			//获取地址
			String address = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("address").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("address",address);
			//获取污染物类型编号
			String pollutantIds = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("pollutant_ids").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("pollutantIds",pollutantIds);
			//获取报警时间
			String occurDatetime = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("occur_datetime").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("occurDatetime",occurDatetime);
			//获取大网格编号
			String gridCode = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("grid_code").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("gridCode",gridCode);
			//获取报警小网格编号
			String resultSubgridCode = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("subgrid_code").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("subgridCode",resultSubgridCode);
			//获取乡镇名称
			String townName = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("town_name").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("townName",townName);
			//获取任务状态
			String statusName = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("status_name").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("statusName",statusName);
			//获取任务类型
			String eventTypeName = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("event_type_name").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("eventTypeName",eventTypeName);
			//获取污染物类型
			if(pollutantIds.equals("134004")){
				arlarmsMap.put("pollutant","PM2.5");
			}else if(pollutantIds.equals("134002")){
				arlarmsMap.put("pollutant","PM10");
			}else if(pollutantIds.equals("121026")){
				arlarmsMap.put("pollutant","SO2");
			}else if(pollutantIds.equals("121005")){
				arlarmsMap.put("pollutant","CO");
			}else if(pollutantIds.equals("121004")){
				arlarmsMap.put("pollutant","NO2");
			}else if(pollutantIds.equals("105024")){
				arlarmsMap.put("pollutant","O3");
			}
			//获取区的名称
			String countyName = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("county_name").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("countyName",countyName);
			//获取市的名称
			String cityName = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("city_name").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("cityName",cityName);
			//经纬度
			String wgs84Lat = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("wgs84_lat").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("wgs84Lat",wgs84Lat);
			String wgs84Lng = jsonList.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("wgs84_lng").getAsString();
			arlarmsMap.put("wgs84Lng",wgs84Lng);

			arlarmsMap = detail(arlarmsMap, id);

			resultList.add(arlarmsMap);
		}

		return resultList;
	}


	public  Map<String,Object> detail(Map<String,Object> map,String eventId) throws Exception {
		String url = "https://api-daily-supervision.airqualitychina.cn:9998/api/events/details";
		JsonObject jsonPrarms = new JsonObject();
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("token","qiYrxXEv5mJPW6-dU5_wQZic0NaiBf_2dNqAal9UUAtpfq9HmIB73P0AoeVE8E4ahr4PzJWr-oZ5x_W09VV6OhjDAAOLbexfvOjNqKZtpI1-ONiwcX89V8nj8e7bRVgBHcAOU2H21RkrAU4lJE6_P39ymZVZZ_2J8p3yx1Of375zlklApzleErrhNUHbxZPYMlkYbf0K2qKxlXuCvyBCnA9840RppIl0QPhrBpEi2xGUhyPey2knMTDaNT8nhefZ1fWNTtq7KUvmKK72Ftv6TQ==");
		jsonPrarms.addProperty("event_id",eventId);
		String resultStr = HttpUtils.HttpGet(url,jsonPrarms);

		Gson gson = new Gson();
		JsonObject fromJson = gson.fromJson(resultStr,JsonObject.class);
		JsonObject jsonList =  fromJson.getAsJsonObject().get("result").getAsJsonObject();

		JsonArray historyLogRecord = jsonList.getAsJsonObject().get("history_log_record").getAsJsonArray();
		for (int k = 0; k < historyLogRecord.size(); k++) {
			String actionName = historyLogRecord.get(k).getAsJsonObject().get("action_name").getAsString();
			if(actionName.equals("事件转办")){
				map.put("desc",historyLogRecord.get(k).getAsJsonObject().get("desc").getAsString());
			}
		}

		return map;
	}

	@ApiOperation("淄博市空气质量报告")
	@RequestMapping("/ziBoGaoXinWeek")
	public Map<String, Object> ziBoGaoXinWeek() {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			ziBoGaoXinWeek.getReportDoc();
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("江苏省项目网格化报告")
	@RequestMapping("/alarmInformation")
	public Map<String, Object> alarmInformation(
			@RequestParam("startTime") String startTime,
			@RequestParam("endTime") String endTime,
			@RequestParam("cityId") String cityId,
			@RequestParam("timeType") String timeType,
			@RequestParam(value="pollutantId",defaultValue = "134004") String pollutantId
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			List<Map<String, Object>> reportDocInforamtion = jiangSuShengAlarm.getReportDocInforamtion(startTime, endTime, cityId, timeType,pollutantId);
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "操作成功");
			resultMap.put("result",reportDocInforamtion);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("江苏省项目网格化报告")
	@RequestMapping("/jiangSuShengPm25")
	public Map<String, Object> jiangSuShengPm25(
			@RequestParam("startTime") String startTime,
			@RequestParam("endTime") String endTime,
			@RequestParam("admId") String admId,
			@RequestParam("admLevel") String admLevel,
			@RequestParam(value = "stationId",required = false,defaultValue = "") String stationId,
			@RequestParam(value = "pageIndex",required = false,defaultValue = "1") Integer pageIndex,
			@RequestParam(value = "pageSize",required = false,defaultValue = "100000") Integer pageSize
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			Map<String, Object> information = jiangSuShengPm25.getInformation(startTime,endTime, admId, admLevel, stationId,pageIndex,pageSize);
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成成功");
			resultMap.putAll(information);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@Autowired
	JiangSuShengAlarmInformation jiangSuShengAlarmInformation;
	@ApiOperation("江苏省项目网格化报告")
	@RequestMapping("/jiangSuShengAlarmInformation")
	public Map<String, Object> jiangSuShengAlarmInformation(
			@RequestParam("timeType") String timeType,
			@RequestParam("polType") String polType,
			@RequestParam("startTime") String startTime,
			@RequestParam("endTime") String endTime,
			@RequestParam("devsiteCodes") String devsiteCodes
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			List<Map<String, Object>> information = jiangSuShengAlarmInformation.getInformation(timeType, polType, startTime, endTime, devsiteCodes);
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成成功");
			resultMap.put("result",information);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("江苏省项目网格化报告")

	public Map<String, Object> jiangSuShengStationInformation(
			@RequestParam("stationList") String stationList,
			@RequestParam("pollutantList") String pollutantList,
			@RequestParam("type") String type,
			@RequestParam("startTime") String startTime,
			@RequestParam("endTime") String endTime
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			List<Map<String, Object>> information = jiangSuShengAlarmInformation.getStationInformation(stationList,pollutantList,type,startTime,endTime);
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成成功");
			resultMap.put("result",information);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

        return resultMap;
    }

	@ApiOperation("鼓楼报警未反馈统计")
	@RequestMapping("/guLouDayNoFeedback")
	public Map<String, Object> guLouDayNoFeedback() {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			guLouDayNoFeedback.getReportDoc();
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@ApiOperation("热区生成报告")
	@RequestMapping("/requReport")
	public Map<String,Object> requReport(
			@RequestParam(value = "startTime",required = true) String startTime,
			@RequestParam(value = "endTime",required = true) String endTime,
			@RequestParam(value = "cityName",required = true) String cityName,
			@RequestParam(value = "areaName",required = true) String areaName
	) throws Exception {
		Map<String,Object> paramMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		paramMap.put("startTime",startTime);
		paramMap.put("endTime",endTime);
		paramMap.put("cityName",cityName);
		paramMap.put("areaName",areaName);


		Map<String, Object> reportDoc = reQuAutoReport.getReportDoc(paramMap);
		return reportDoc;
	}

	@ApiOperation("一站一档导出Word")
	@RequestMapping("/oneStationWord")
	public Map<String, Object> jiangSuShengPm25(
			@RequestParam("startTime") String startTime,
			@RequestParam("endTime") String endTime,
			@RequestParam("sourcesId") String sourcesId,
			@RequestParam("time") String time,
			@RequestParam("stationPol") String stationPol,
			@RequestParam("type") String type,
			@RequestParam("id") String id,
			@RequestParam(value = "provinceId") String provinceId,
			@RequestParam(value = "cityId", required = false,defaultValue = "") String cityId,
			@RequestParam(value = "districtId", required = false,defaultValue = "") String districtId,
			@RequestParam(value = "streetId", required = false,defaultValue = "") String streetId,
			@RequestParam(value = "lon") String lon,
			@RequestParam(value = "lat") String lat
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			String reportDoc = oneStation.getReportDoc(time, startTime, endTime, sourcesId, stationPol, type, id, provinceId, cityId, districtId, streetId, lon, lat);
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("url",reportDoc);
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报告生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

    ) {

            e.printStackTrace();

        }

			@RequestParam("excel") MultipartFile file
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();

			excelOut.getExcel(file);

		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;

	@ApiOperation("江宁区彩虹桥图片")
	@RequestMapping("/nanJIngCaiHongQiaoImg")
	public Map<String, Object> nanJIngCaiHongQiaoImg(
			@RequestParam(value = "countyName") String countyName,
			@RequestParam(value = "time") String time
	) {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			String alarmData = nanJIngCaiHongQiaoImg.getAlarmData(countyName,time);
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
			resultMap.put("imgUrl",alarmData);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}

	@Autowired
	ZouPingWeek zouPingWeek;
	@Autowired
	ZouPingCopyWeek zouPingCopyWeek;
	@Autowired
	ZouPingMonth zouPingMonth;
	@Autowired
	ZouPingCopyMonth zouPingCopyMonth;
	//@ApiOperation("雨花中华门图片")
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		try {
			//for (int i = 1; i <=15 ; i++) {
			//	List<Map<String, Object>> sevenDayFirstMaps = new ZouPingWeek().cityControlledStation(LocalDateTime.now(), i, false, 0,"SO2",true,1);
			//	ArrayList<String> stringFirst = new ArrayList<>();
			//	for (Map<String, Object> sevenDayMap : sevenDayFirstMaps) {
			//		String stationName = sevenDayMap.get("stationName").toString();
			//		stringFirst.add(stationName);
			//	}
			//	System.err.println(stringFirst);
			//}





			System.err.println(1);


		} catch (Exception e) {
			throw new RuntimeException(e);
		}
	}



	@RequestMapping("/zouPingWeek")
	public Map<String, Object> ZouPingWeek() {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			zouPingCopyWeek.getWeekDoc();
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			//resultMap.put("data", alarmInformation);
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}
	@RequestMapping("/zouPingMonth")
	public Map<String, Object> zouPingMonth() {
		Map<String, Object> resultMap = Maps.newHashMap();
		try {
			zouPingCopyMonth.getMondayDoc();
			resultMap.put("code", "2000");
			//resultMap.put("data", alarmInformation);
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成成功");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			resultMap.put("code", "500");
			resultMap.put("msg", "报警生成失败");
		}
		return resultMap;
	}
	@Autowired
	private FinancialStatementService financialStatementService;
	@PostMapping("/getPagingFinancialStatementByConditions")
	public ResponseBean getPagingFinancialStatementByConditions(@RequestParam(defaultValue = "1") Integer pageNum,
																@RequestParam(defaultValue = "10") Integer pageSize,
																@RequestParam(required = false,defaultValue = "") String startTime,
																@RequestParam(required = false,defaultValue = "") String endTime,
																@RequestParam(defaultValue = "") String content) {
		return financialStatementService.getPagingFinancialStatementByConditions(pageNum, pageSize, startTime,endTime, content);
	}

	@PostMapping("/delete")
	public ResponseBean deleteFinancialStatement(@RequestBody Long[] ids) {
		return financialStatementService.deleteFinancialStatement(ids);
	}
	@PostMapping("/delete")
	public ResponseBean deleteFinancialStatement(@RequestBody Long[] ids) {
		return financialStatementService.deleteFinancialStatement(ids);
	}
}
