    package com.ysrdnj.smartms.autoreport.shandong.weekAutoReport;

import cn.hutool.core.convert.Convert;
import cn.hutool.core.convert.NumberChineseFormatter;
import cn.hutool.core.date.DatePattern;
import cn.hutool.core.date.LocalDateTimeUtil;
import cn.hutool.core.util.StrUtil;
import cn.hutool.http.HttpUtil;
import cn.hutool.json.JSONArray;
import cn.hutool.json.JSONObject;
import cn.hutool.json.JSONUtil;
import com.google.common.collect.Lists;
import com.google.common.collect.Maps;
import com.google.gson.Gson;
import com.google.gson.JsonArray;
import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
import com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.DateUtil;
import com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.ExportCharts;
import com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.HttpUtils;
import com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.publicClass.ChartUtils;
import com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.publicClass.Information;
import com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.publicClass.MathUtils;
import com.ysrdnj.smartms.utils.publicClass.Order;
import org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException;
import org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import org.springframework.util.StringUtils;

import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.time.DayOfWeek;
import java.time.LocalDate;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.time.LocalTime;
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.Comparator;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;

@Service
public class ZouPingWeek {

    Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ZouPingWeek.class);
    // 模板路径
    @Value("${auto.report.template.path}")
    String autoReportTemplatePath;
    // 服务器
    @Value("${env-name}")
    String envName;
    // 访问路径
    @Value("${static-file-url}")
    String staticFileUrl;
    // 导出路径
    @Value("${auto.report.doc.path}")
    String autoReportDocPath;

    // 图片存储地址
    @Value("${auto.report.img.path}")
    String autoReportImgPath;
    List<Object> objectArrayList = new ArrayList<>();

    public void getWeekDoc() throws Exception {
        LocalDateTime today = LocalDateTime.now();
        String date = "（" + DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy年M月d日") + "-"
                + DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "yyyy年M月d日") + "）";
        //文件名称
        String docName = "邹平市热点网格分析周报" + date + ".docx";
        //读取模板文件对象
        String tempDocUrl = autoReportTemplatePath + "/ZouPingWeek.docx";
        String reportDocUrl = autoReportDocPath + "/shangdongsheng/zoupingshi/" + docName;
        //读入模板文件流
        InputStream inputStream = new FileInputStream(new File(tempDocUrl));
        //获取docx对象
        XWPFDocument docx = new XWPFDocument(inputStream);


        String startDateTimeStr = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy-MM-dd 00:00:00");
        String endDateTimeStr = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "yyyy-MM-dd 23:59:59");

        getAlarmInformation(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, "1","", docx);


        // 获取本周的周一
        LocalDate monday = LocalDate.now().with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY);
        // 当天开始时间
        LocalDateTime startDateTime = LocalDateTime.of(monday, LocalTime.MIN);
        // 当天结束时间
        LocalDateTime endDateTime = LocalDateTime.of(monday, LocalTime.MAX);
        DateTimeFormatter formatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");

        getPolData(startDateTime.format(formatter), endDateTime.format(formatter), "436", docx, today);

        tvocRanking(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, docx, today);
        String[] titleFirst = {"stationName", "SO2", "SO2Rank", "stationNameOne", "NO2", "NO2Rank"};
        String[] titleTwo = {"stationName", "PM2.5", "PM2.5Rank", "stationNameOne", "PM10", "PM10Rank"};
        String[] titleThree = {"stationName", "CO", "CORank", "stationNameOne", "O3", "O3Rank"};
        String[] fontFamily = {"仿宋_GB2312", "Times New Roman", "Times New Roman", "仿宋_GB2312", "Times New Roman", "Times New Roman"};
        ChartUtils.setTable(getInformation("SO2", "NO2"), docx, 3, titleFirst, fontFamily, 12, 1, 1, new HashMap<>());
        ChartUtils.setTable(getInformation("PM2.5", "PM10"), docx, 4, titleTwo, fontFamily, 12, 1, 1, new HashMap<>());
        ChartUtils.setTable(getInformation("CO", "O3"), docx, 5, titleThree, fontFamily, 12, 1, 1, new HashMap<>());
        String first = cityControlledStationStr(today, 1, false, 0, "SO2", true, 2, 1);
        String second =cityControlledStationStr(today,1,false,0,"NO2", true,2,1);
        String third =cityControlledStationStr(today,1,false,0,"PM2.5", true,2,1);
        String fourth =cityControlledStationStr(today,1,false,0,"PM10", true,2,1);
        String fifth =cityControlledStationStr(today,1,false,0,"CO", true,2,1);
        String sixth =cityControlledStationStr(today,1,false,0,"O3", true,2,1);
        Map<String, String> textMap = new HashMap<>();
        textMap.put("ControlledStationFirstStr",first+second);
        textMap.put("ControlledStationSecondStr",third+fourth);
        textMap.put("ControlledStationT",fifth+sixth);
        ExportCharts.doParagraphs(docx, textMap);

        pointRealTimeAlarmStatisticsParagraph(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, docx, today);
        String[] pointRealTimeAlarmTitle = {"firstDevsiteName", "firstAlarmCount", "secondDevsiteName", "secondAlarmCount"};
        String[] pointRealTimeAlarmFontFamily = {"仿宋_GB2312", "Times New Roman", "仿宋_GB2312", "Times New Roman"};
        ChartUtils.setTable(pointRealTimeAlarmStatistics(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, "134004"), docx, 1, pointRealTimeAlarmTitle, pointRealTimeAlarmFontFamily, 12, 1, 1, new HashMap<>());
        ChartUtils.setTable(pointRealTimeAlarmStatistics(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, "199054"), docx, 1, pointRealTimeAlarmTitle, pointRealTimeAlarmFontFamily, 12, 3, 1, new HashMap<>());


        String dater=DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyyMMdd") + "_"
                + DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "yyyyMMdd");
        String TVOC = "https://f.hotgrid.cn/picture-service/pollutant/153/23906/weekly/TVOC_"+dater+".png";
        ExportCharts.insertImage4("VOCIMG",docx,TVOC,250,250);
        String PM25 = "https://f.hotgrid.cn/picture-service/pollutant/153/23906/weekly/PM25_"+dater+".png";
        ExportCharts.insertImage4("PM25IMG",docx,PM25,250,250);

        composite(docx);
        FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(new File(reportDocUrl));
        docx.write(fileOutputStream);
        fileOutputStream.close();
        inputStream.close();

    }

    /**
     * 热点网格报警统计
     *
     * @param startTime   上一周的开始时间
     * @param endTime     一周的结束时间
     * @param eventTypeId eventTypeId
     * @param docx        XWPFDocument
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public void getAlarmInformation(String startTime, String endTime, String eventTypeId, String pollutant_id,XWPFDocument docx) throws Exception {
        JsonArray resultArray = getRealTimeAlarmTaskUrl(startTime, endTime, pollutant_id,eventTypeId);
        List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = new ArrayList<>();
        resultArray.forEach(res -> {
            Map<String, Object> resultMap = new HashMap<>();
            String address = res.getAsJsonObject().get("address").getAsString().replaceAll("山东省滨州市邹平市", "");
            String pollutant_ids = res.getAsJsonObject().get("pollutant_ids").getAsString();
            resultMap.put("address", address);
            resultMap.put("pollutant_ids", pollutant_ids);
            resultList.add(resultMap);
        });

        HashMap<String, Integer> stringObjectHashMap = new HashMap<>();
        // 按照污染类型分组
        Map<Object, List<Map<String, Object>>> pollutant_ids = resultList.stream().collect(Collectors.groupingBy(g -> g.get("pollutant_ids")));
        pollutant_ids.forEach((k, v) -> {
            stringObjectHashMap.put(k.toString(), v.size());
        });

        // map根据value值排序获取数值最多的污染物做为主要污染物
        List<Map.Entry<String, Integer>> list = new ArrayList<>(stringObjectHashMap.entrySet());
        // 返回值为int类型，⼤于0表⽰正序，⼩于0表⽰逆序
        Collections.sort(list, (o1, o2) -> (o2.getValue() - o1.getValue()));
        String alarmPrimary = polluteType(list.get(0).getKey());

        // 获取主要污染物的数据
        List<Map<String, Object>> addressAlarmCountList = pollutant_ids.get(list.get(0).getKey());
        // 在主要污染物里面在根据地址分组并统计报警次数
        Map<Object, List<Map<String, Object>>> alarmCountGroupByAddress = addressAlarmCountList.stream().collect(Collectors.groupingBy(g -> g.get("address")));
        // 将地址以及报警次数封装成集合
        List<Map<String, Object>> alarmCountGroupByAddressList = new ArrayList<>();
        alarmCountGroupByAddress.forEach((k, v) -> {
            Map<String, Object> obj = new HashMap<>();
            obj.put("address", k.toString());
            obj.put("alarmTotalCount", v.size());
            alarmCountGroupByAddressList.add(obj);
        });

        String[] title = {"address", "alarmTotalCount"};
        String[] fontFamily = {"仿宋_GB2312", "Times New Roman"};
        HashMap<String, String> titleFill = new HashMap<>();
        titleFill.put("alarmPrimary", alarmPrimary);
        titleFill.put("alarmTotal", resultList.size() + "");
        ChartUtils.setTable(alarmCountGroupByAddressList, docx, 0, title, fontFamily, 12, 1, 1, titleFill);
        ExportCharts.doParagraphs(docx, titleFill);
    }



    /**
     * 微站情况
     *
     * @param startTime 上一周的开始时间
     * @param endTime   上一周的结束时间
     * @param docx      XWPFDocument
     * @param today     日期
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public void tvocRanking(String startTime, String endTime, XWPFDocument docx, LocalDateTime today) throws Exception {
        List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = getLastFifteenTVOCMaps(startTime, endTime);

        // stream流排序然后截取15位并降序
        //List<Map<String, Object>> collect = Order.informationOrder("TVOCConcentration", resultList, 15, -1);
        List<Map<String, Object>> collect = resultList.stream().sorted(Comparator.comparing(ZouPingWeek::getMapValueByTVOCConcentration).reversed()).limit(15).collect(Collectors.toList());


        for (int i = 0; i < collect.size(); i++) {
            collect.get(i).put("ranking", i + 1);
        }
        // 根据数值添加排名，如果数值一样,排名一样
        List<Map<String, Object>> maps = Order.resultRank(collect, "TVOCConcentration", "ranking", -1);
        String[] title = {"name", "admin_town_name", "TVOCConcentration", "ranking"};
        String[] fontFamily = {"仿宋_GB2312", "仿宋_GB2312", "Times New Roman", "Times New Roman"};
        ChartUtils.setTable(maps, docx, 6, title, fontFamily, 12, 1, 1, new HashMap<>());
        // 拼接字符串
        String template = "{}，邹平市高密度监测点位中TVOC指标排名靠后的为{}等。应加强对以上微站周边区域的走航巡查管控工作，严禁超标排放现象";
        List<Map<String, Object>> ranking = Order.informationOrderTo("ranking", maps, 3, -1);
        StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
        for (int i = 0; i < ranking.size(); i++) {
            if (i == (ranking.size() - 1)) {
                buffer.append(ranking.get(i).get("admin_town_name") + "\"" + ranking.get(i).get("name") + "\"");
            } else {
                buffer.append(ranking.get(i).get("admin_town_name") + "\"" + ranking.get(i).get("name") + "\"" + "、");

            }
        }


        String dateTime = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy年M月d日") + "-" +
                DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "M月d日");
        String dateTime1 = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy年M月d日") + "-" +
                DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "d日");
        String dateTime2 = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "M月d日") + "-" +
                DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "d日");
        String tvocStr = StrUtil.format(template, dateTime, buffer);


        HashMap<String, String> titleFill = new HashMap<>();

        titleFill.put("tvocstr", tvocStr);
        titleFill.put("zoupingdate", dateTime1);
        titleFill.put("zousecpingdate", dateTime2);
        titleFill.put("zoupingtitledate", dateTime);
        titleFill.put("smallStation", dateTime + "，邹平市高密度监测点位中TVOC指标浓度排名");

        ExportCharts.doParagraphs(docx, titleFill);

    }

    public List<Map<String, Object>> getLastFifteenTVOCMaps(String startTime, String endTime) throws Exception {
        String url = "https://api-qc-data-service.airqualitychina.cn/maintain/regoin_qc_data_hotmap_download";
        JsonObject jsonParams = new JsonObject();
        jsonParams.addProperty("token", "qiYrxXEv5mJPW6-dU5_wQevyN8JTGBKDnZv2GLjs2mei23A8iCQG_TwWsu1qDcoIWwZt9jr0aGPuLtiWRZ8ewq_D14tsI6EtCtiyOgxa4CXtooG7cdPZa3VN27bCfNSFeqKF3m5q3-CMcmJSbFTyKIQU83Q16pkCd7jQ6DVoKfFrz-VwB-_VIIPZeKTIZfAYmtQwnePQUKRdI-mtURPkHSZP6zfQtrihLJZolCCKgOKlBz4Fz-Wcf5hl7wWfQkl_fzU_Hszgcwm5h4y9xdHyYQ==");
        jsonParams.addProperty("projectCode", "153");
        jsonParams.addProperty("admLevel", "3");
        jsonParams.addProperty("admId", "23906");
        jsonParams.addProperty("devsiteProp", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("startTime", startTime);
        jsonParams.addProperty("endTime", endTime);
        jsonParams.addProperty("timeType", "1d");
        jsonParams.addProperty("polType", "199054");
        jsonParams.addProperty("hasCamera", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("round_qc", "+");
        JsonObject jsonObject = Information.sendHttpGet(url, jsonParams);
        JsonArray resultArray = jsonObject.getAsJsonObject().get("result").getAsJsonArray();
        List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = new ArrayList<>();
        resultArray.forEach(res -> {
            Map<String, Object> resultMap = new HashMap<>();
            String name = res.getAsJsonObject().get("name").getAsString();
            String address = res.getAsJsonObject().get("admin_town_name").getAsString();
            JsonArray dataArray = res.getAsJsonObject().get("data").getAsJsonArray();
            JsonObject asJsonObject = dataArray.get(0).getAsJsonObject();
            JsonArray jsonArray = asJsonObject.get("values").getAsJsonArray();
            ArrayList<Object> objects = new ArrayList<>();
            for (int i = 0; i < jsonArray.size(); i++) {
                if(jsonArray.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("qc_value").getAsDouble()>0){
                    double qc_value = jsonArray.get(i).getAsJsonObject().get("qc_value").getAsDouble();
                    objects.add(qc_value);
                }
            }
            double collect = objects.stream().collect(Collectors.averagingDouble(e -> Double.parseDouble(e.toString()))) * 1000;
            // doblue保留一位小数四舍五入
            BigDecimal b = new BigDecimal(collect);
            collect = b.setScale(1, BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_UP).doubleValue();

            resultMap.put("name", name);
            resultMap.put("admin_town_name", address);
            resultMap.put("TVOCConcentration", collect);
            resultList.add(resultMap);
        });
        return resultList;
    }

    /**
     * 邹平市概况
     *
     * @param start    本周一的开始时间
     * @param end      本周一的结束时间
     * @param sourceId eventTypeId
     * @param docx     XWPFDocument
     * @param today    今天
     * @throws Exception
     */

    public void getPolData(String start, String end, String sourceId, XWPFDocument docx, LocalDateTime today) throws IOException, InvalidFormatException {
        JSONArray jsonArray = getObjects(start, end, sourceId);
        // 过滤掉不是邹平市的
        List<Object> collect = jsonArray.stream().filter(e -> JSONUtil.parseObj(e).getStr("station_name").equals("邹平市")).collect(Collectors.toList());

        //将string类型时间变成LocalDate
        String collect_datetime = JSONUtil.parseObj(collect.get(0)).getStr("collect_datetime");
        DateTimeFormatter formatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd");
        LocalDate parse = LocalDate.parse(collect_datetime, formatter);
        // 当天开始时间
        LocalDateTime startDateTime = LocalDateTime.of(parse, LocalTime.MIN);
        // 当天结束时间
        LocalDateTime endDateTime = LocalDateTime.of(parse, LocalTime.MAX);
        // 将localdatetime时间格式化成字符串格式
        DateTimeFormatter formatter1 = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
        String startDateTimeStr = startDateTime.format(formatter1);
        String endDateTimeStr = endDateTime.format(formatter1);


        objectArrayList.addAll(collect);
        if (objectArrayList.size() < 7) {
            getPolData(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, sourceId, docx, today);
        } else {
            // 按照时间降序排列后截取7个
            Comparator<Object> comparator = Comparator.comparing(
                    str -> LocalDate.parse(JSONUtil.parseObj(str).getStr("collect_datetime"), formatter)
            );
            List<Object> dataArray = objectArrayList.stream().sorted(comparator.reversed()).limit(7).collect(Collectors.toList());


            List<Map<String, Object>> list = new ArrayList<>();
            dataArray.forEach(e -> {
                Map<String, Object> dataMap = Maps.newHashMap();
                JSONObject jsonObj = JSONUtil.parseObj(e);
                String O3 = jsonObj.getStr("O3");
                String CO = jsonObj.getStr("CO");
                String NO2 = jsonObj.getStr("NO2");
                String collectDatetime = jsonObj.getStr("collect_datetime");
                String PM25 = jsonObj.getStr("PM2.5");
                String SO2 = jsonObj.getStr("SO2");
                String PM10 = jsonObj.getStr("PM10");
                String IaqiType = jsonObj.getStr("IaqiType");
                // co不用*1000,其余要乘以1000
                dataMap.put("O3", Double.parseDouble(O3) * 1000);
                dataMap.put("CO", Double.parseDouble(CO));
                dataMap.put("NO2", Double.parseDouble(NO2) * 1000);
                dataMap.put("collect_datetime", collectDatetime);
                dataMap.put("PM2.5", Double.parseDouble(PM25) * 1000);
                dataMap.put("SO2", Double.parseDouble(SO2) * 1000);
                dataMap.put("PM10", Double.parseDouble(PM10) * 1000);
                dataMap.put("IaqiType", IaqiType);
                list.add(dataMap);
            });


            // 污染物平均值map
            Map<String, String> textMap = new HashMap<>();
            //求污染物的平均值
            String[] polData = {"PM2.5", "PM10", "SO2", "NO2", "O3"};
            for (String polDatum : polData) {
                if (!"O3".equals(polDatum)) {
                    double polluteType = list.stream().collect(Collectors.averagingDouble(e ->
                            Double.parseDouble(JSONUtil.parseObj(e).getStr(polDatum))));
                    textMap.put(polDatum, String.format("%.0f", polluteType));
                } else {
                    textMap.put("O3", String.format("%.0f", MathUtils.getSubindex(list, "O3", 0.9)));
                }
            }
            double co = MathUtils.getSubindex(list, "CO", 0.95);
            textMap.put("CO", String.format("%.1f", co));


            // 优良天气数
            int size = dataArray.stream().filter(e ->
                            ("优").equals(JSONUtil.parseObj(e).get("IaqiType"))
                                    || ("良").equals(JSONUtil.parseObj(e).get("IaqiType")))
                    .collect(Collectors.toList()).size();
            // 综合指数
            Object zhzs = MathUtils.getComprehensiveIndex(list).get(0).get("zhzs");
            textMap.put("zhzs", zhzs.toString() + "，" + String.valueOf(size));
            String date = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "M月d日") + "-" +
                    DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "M月d日");
            textMap.put("date", date);
            objectArrayList.clear();
            ExportCharts.doParagraphs(docx, textMap);
        }
    }


    public static Double getMapValueByTVOCConcentration(Map<String, Object> map) {
        return Convert.toDouble(map.get("TVOCConcentration"));
    }

    public static Integer getMapValueByAlarmCount(Map<String, Object> map) {
        return Convert.toInt(map.get("alarmCount"));
    }

    public  String polluteType(String code) {
        String type = "";
        switch (code) {
            case "134004":
                type = "PM2.5";
                break;
            case "134002":
                type = "PM10";
                break;
            case "121026":
                type = "SO2";
                break;
            case "121005":
                type = "CO";
                break;
            case "121004":
                type = "NO2";
                break;
            case "105024":
                type = "O3";
                break;
            case "209002":
                type = "AQI";
                break;
            case "199054":
                type = "TVOC";
                break;
            case "134001":
                type = "TSP";
                break;
            default:
                type = "";
        }
        return type;
    }


    public static JSONArray getObjects(String start, String end, String sourceId) {
        String getCodeUrl = "http://api.wbsjcj.airqualitychina.cn:8819/api/data-list";
        HashMap<String, Object> paramMap = new HashMap<>();
        paramMap.put("start_datetime", start);
        paramMap.put("end_datetime", end);
        paramMap.put("source_id", sourceId);
        // 发送请求
        String data = HttpUtil.get(getCodeUrl, paramMap);
        // 解析返回数据
        JSONObject jsonObject = JSONUtil.parseObj(data);
        // 解析数据结构获取code
        String result = jsonObject.getStr("result");
        JSONObject resultObject = JSONUtil.parseObj(result);
        String dataStr = resultObject.getStr("data");
        JSONArray dataArr = JSONUtil.parseArray(dataStr);
        if (dataArr.size() == 0) {
            throw new RuntimeException("未获取到code数据");
        } else {
            String code = JSONUtil.parseObj(dataArr.get(0)).getStr("code");
            String getDataUrl = "http://api.wbsjcj.airqualitychina.cn:8819/api/data";
            HashMap<String, Object> paramDataMap = new HashMap<>();
            paramDataMap.put("code", code);
            String datas = HttpUtil.get(getDataUrl, paramDataMap);
            JSONArray jsonArray = JSONUtil.parseArray(datas);
            return jsonArray;
        }
    }

    /**
     * 邹平市概况
     *
     * @param today         今天的时间
     * @param weekCount     那一周 1表示上一周 2表示上上一周
     * @param isBeforeYear  是否是之前年的数据
     * @param lastYearCount 是之前的数据的话，是过去第几年 1表示上一年 2表示上上一年
     * @param polluteType   污染类型
     * @param isLimitRank   是否要截取排名
     * @param limitCount    截取几名（名次 如果倒序，那么2就表示倒数两名）
     * @param order         1正序 -1倒叙
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public List<Map<String, Object>> cityControlledStation(LocalDateTime today, Integer weekCount, Boolean isBeforeYear, Integer lastYearCount, String polluteType, Boolean isLimitRank, Integer limitCount, Integer order) throws Exception {
        List<Map<String, Object>> outList = getPolluteDataMaps(today, weekCount, isBeforeYear, lastYearCount);
        List<Map<String, Object>> rank = Collections.emptyList();
        if (isLimitRank) {
            rank = Order.informationOrder(polluteType + "Rank", Order.resultRank(outList, polluteType, polluteType + "Rank", order), limitCount, -order);
        } else {
            rank = Order.resultRank(outList, polluteType, polluteType + "Rank", order);
        }
        return rank;
    }

    public List<Map<String, Object>> getPolluteDataMaps(LocalDateTime today, Integer weekCount, Boolean isBeforeYear, Integer lastYearCount) throws Exception {
        List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = getSevenDayMaps(today, weekCount, isBeforeYear, lastYearCount);
        Map<Object, List<Map<String, Object>>> collect = resultList.stream().filter(g -> !g.get("stationName").toString().equals("邹平市")).collect(Collectors.groupingBy(g -> g.get("stationName")));
        List<Map<String, Object>> outList = new ArrayList<>();
        collect.forEach((k, v) -> {
            Map<String, Object> resultMap = new HashMap<>();
            resultMap.put("stationName", k);
            String[] pol = {"PM2.5", "PM10", "NO2", "CO", "SO2", "O3"};
            for (int i = 0; i < pol.length; i++) {
                int finalI = i;
                double average = v.stream().filter(g -> !StringUtils.isEmpty(g.get(pol[finalI])) && Double.parseDouble(g.get(pol[finalI]) + "") > 0).mapToDouble(g -> Double.parseDouble(g.get(pol[finalI]) + "")).summaryStatistics().getAverage();
                if (pol[i].equals("CO")) {
                    resultMap.put(pol[finalI], String.format("%.1f", average));
                } else {
                    resultMap.put(pol[finalI], String.format("%.0f", average));
                }
            }
            outList.add(resultMap);
        });
        return outList;
    }


    public void composite(XWPFDocument docx) throws Exception {
        LocalDateTime today = LocalDateTime.now();
        List<Map<String, Object>> polluteDataMaps = getPolluteDataMaps(today, 1, false, 0);
        List<Map<String, Object>> finallyData = new ArrayList<>();

        // 综合指数
        for (Map<String, Object> comprehensiveIndex : MathUtils.getComprehensiveIndex(polluteDataMaps)) {
            Map<String, Object> objectObjectHashMap = new HashMap<>();
            objectObjectHashMap.put("zhzs", comprehensiveIndex.get("zhzs"));
            objectObjectHashMap.put("stationName", comprehensiveIndex.get("stationName"));
            finallyData.add(objectObjectHashMap);
        }
        String pollutant[] = {"zhzs"};
        ChartUtils.setHistogram(finallyData, "stationName", pollutant, "1", docx);
        System.err.println(1);
    }


    /**
     * 获取数据
     *
     * @param today         今天的时间
     * @param weekCount     那一周 1表示上一周 2表示上上一周
     * @param isBeforeYear  是否是之前年的数据
     * @param lastYearCount 是之前的数据的话，是过去第几年 1表示上一年 2表示上上一年
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public List<Map<String, Object>> getSevenDayMaps(LocalDateTime today, Integer weekCount, Boolean isBeforeYear, Integer lastYearCount) throws Exception {
        List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = new ArrayList<>();
        String monday = "";
        if (isBeforeYear) {
            for (int i = 0; i < 7; i += 3) {
                // 获取本周的周一或者是那一年本周的周一
                String startTime = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusYears(lastYearCount).minusWeeks(weekCount - 1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY).minusDays(i), "yyyy-MM-dd+00:00:00");
                String endTime = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusYears(lastYearCount).minusWeeks(weekCount - 1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY).minusDays(i), "yyyy-MM-dd+23:59:59");
                List<Map<String, Object>> polData = getPolDataTime(startTime, endTime,"436");
                resultList.addAll(polData);
            }
            monday = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusYears(lastYearCount).minusWeeks(weekCount).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy-MM-dd");
        } else {
            for (int i = 0; i < 7; i += 3) {
                String startTime = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(weekCount - 1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY).minusDays(i), "yyyy-MM-dd+00:00:00");
                String endTime = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(weekCount - 1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY).minusDays(i), "yyyy-MM-dd+23:59:59");
                List<Map<String, Object>> polData = getPolDataTime(startTime, endTime,"436");
                resultList.addAll(polData);
            }
            monday = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(weekCount).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy-MM-dd");
        }
        // 只留下日期比monday大或者等于的的
        for (int i = 0; i < resultList.size(); i++) {
            if (resultList.get(i).get("collectDatetime").toString().compareTo(monday) < 0) {
                resultList.remove(i);
                i--;
            }
        }
        return resultList;
    }

    public void lastSixIndicators(LocalDateTime today, Integer weekCount, Boolean isBeforeYear, Integer lastYearCount, String starterFormatter, String endFormatter) throws Exception {
        List<Map<String, Object>> sevenDayMaps = getSevenDayMaps(today, weekCount, isBeforeYear, lastYearCount);
        Map<Object, List<Map<String, Object>>> collect = sevenDayMaps.stream().filter(
                        g -> g.get("stationName").toString().equals("黄山实验中学") || g.get("stationName").toString().equals("黛溪街道"))
                .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(g -> g.get("stationName")));
        List<Map<String, Object>> outList = new ArrayList<>();
        collect.forEach((k, v) -> {
            Map<String, Object> resultMap = new HashMap<>();
            resultMap.put("stationName", k);
            String[] polData = {"PM2.5", "PM10", "SO2", "NO2", "O3"};
            for (String polDatum : polData) {
                if (!"O3".equals(polDatum)) {
                    double polluteType = v.stream().collect(Collectors.averagingDouble(e ->
                            Double.parseDouble(e.get(polDatum) + "")));
                    resultMap.put(polDatum, String.format("%.0f", polluteType));
                } else {
                    resultMap.put("O3", String.format("%.0f", MathUtils.getSubindex(v, "O3", 0.9)));
                }
            }
            DateTimeFormatter formatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd");
            Comparator<Object> comparator = Comparator.comparing(
                    str -> LocalDate.parse(JSONUtil.parseObj(str).getStr("collectDatetime"), formatter)
            );
            // 上周的周一
            String startStr = today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY).format(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(starterFormatter));
            //上周的周日
            String endStr = today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY).format(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(endFormatter));


            double co = MathUtils.getSubindex(v, "CO", 0.95);
            resultMap.put("CO", String.format("%.1f", co));
            resultMap.put("datetime", startStr + "-" + endStr);
            outList.add(resultMap);
        });

        System.err.println(1);
    }

    /**
     * 各市控站点排名情况
     *
     * @param polOne 污染物类型1
     * @param polTwo 污染物类型2
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public List<Map<String, Object>> getInformation(String polOne, String polTwo) throws Exception {
        LocalDateTime today = LocalDateTime.now();
        List<Map<String, Object>> polList = cityControlledStation(today, 1, false, 0, polOne, false, 0, 1);
        List<Map<String, Object>> polOneList = cityControlledStation(today, 1, false, 0, polTwo, false, 0, 1);
        for (int i = 0; i < polList.size(); i++) {
            polList.get(i).put(polTwo, polOneList.get(i).get(polTwo));
            polList.get(i).put(polTwo + "Rank", polOneList.get(i).get(polTwo + "Rank"));
            polList.get(i).put("stationNameOne", polOneList.get(i).get("stationName"));
        }
        return polList;
    }

    /**
     * 获取传入天数的前三天的数据
     *
     * @param startTime 一天的开始
     * @param endTime   一天的结束
     * @param source_id   436 传入一天的开始和结束获取到这天前三天的数据（不包含这天） 435传入周日的开始和结束（开始<06:10:14<结束）获取周日所在周一周的数据
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public List<Map<String, Object>> getPolDataTime(String startTime, String endTime,String source_id) throws Exception {
        String url = "http://api.wbsjcj.airqualitychina.cn:8819/api/data-list";
        String params = "start_datetime=" + startTime + "&end_datetime=" + endTime + "&source_id="+source_id;
        String returnStr = HttpUtils.sendGet(url, params);
        Gson gson = new Gson();
        JsonObject jsonObject = gson.fromJson(returnStr, JsonObject.class);
        JsonArray result = jsonObject.getAsJsonObject().get("result").getAsJsonObject().get("data").getAsJsonArray();
        if (result.size() == 0) {
            return Collections.emptyList();
        }
        String code = result.get(0).getAsJsonObject().get("code").getAsString();
        String getDataUrl = "http://api.wbsjcj.airqualitychina.cn:8819/api/data";
        HashMap<String, Object> paramDataMap = new HashMap<>();
        paramDataMap.put("code", code);
        String datas = HttpUtil.get(getDataUrl, paramDataMap);
        JsonArray asJsonArray = gson.fromJson(datas, JsonArray.class);
        List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = Lists.newArrayList();
        asJsonArray.forEach(r -> {
            Map<String, Object> resultMap = new HashMap<>();
            String IaqiType = r.getAsJsonObject().get("IaqiType").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "");
            String stationName = r.getAsJsonObject().get("station_name").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "");
            String collectDatetime = r.getAsJsonObject().get("collect_datetime").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "");
            String co ="";
            String no2 ="";
            String o3 ="";
            String pm25 ="";
            String pm10 ="";
            String so2 ="";
            if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(r.getAsJsonObject().get("CO").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", ""))){ // 如果为空字符串，不会执行{}中的语句
                 co = r.getAsJsonObject().get("CO").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "");
            }
            if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(r.getAsJsonObject().get("NO2").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", ""))){ // 如果为空字符串，不会执行{}中的语句
                no2 = String.format("%.1f", Double.parseDouble(r.getAsJsonObject().get("NO2").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "")) * 1000);
            }
            if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(r.getAsJsonObject().get("O3").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", ""))){ // 如果为空字符串，不会执行{}中的语句
                o3 = String.format("%.1f", Double.parseDouble(r.getAsJsonObject().get("O3").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "")) * 1000);
            }
            if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(r.getAsJsonObject().get("PM2.5").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", ""))){ // 如果为空字符串，不会执行{}中的语句
                pm25 = String.format("%.1f", Double.parseDouble(r.getAsJsonObject().get("PM2.5").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "")) * 1000);
            }
            if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(r.getAsJsonObject().get("PM10").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", ""))){ // 如果为空字符串，不会执行{}中的语句
                pm10 = String.format("%.1f", Double.parseDouble(r.getAsJsonObject().get("PM10").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "")) * 1000);
            }
            if(!StringUtils.isEmpty(r.getAsJsonObject().get("SO2").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", ""))){ // 如果为空字符串，不会执行{}中的语句
                so2 = String.format("%.1f", Double.parseDouble(r.getAsJsonObject().get("SO2").getAsString().replaceAll("\"", "")) * 1000);
            }
            resultMap.put("stationName", stationName);
            resultMap.put("collectDatetime", collectDatetime);
            resultMap.put("IaqiType", IaqiType);
            resultMap.put("CO", co);
            resultMap.put("NO2", no2);
            resultMap.put("O3", o3);
            resultMap.put("PM2.5", pm25);
            resultMap.put("PM10", pm10);
            resultMap.put("SO2", so2);
            // System.err.println(resultMap);
            if(!"".equals(resultMap.get("CO"))&& !"".equals(resultMap.get("NO2"))&&!"".equals(resultMap.get("O3"))&&!"".equals(resultMap.get("PM2.5"))&&!"".equals(resultMap.get("PM10"))
                    &&!"".equals(resultMap.get("SO2"))){
                resultList.add(resultMap);
            }
        });
        return resultList;
    }


    public List<Map<String, Object>> pointRealTimeAlarmStatistics(String startTime, String endTime, String pollutantId) throws Exception {
        JsonArray resultArray = getJsonElements(startTime, endTime, pollutantId);
        List<String> devsiteNameList = new ArrayList<>();
        resultArray.forEach(res -> {
            JsonArray source = res.getAsJsonObject().get("source").getAsJsonArray();
            source.forEach(e -> {
                String devsiteName = e.getAsJsonObject().get("devsite_name").getAsString();
                devsiteNameList.add(devsiteName);
            });
        });
        Map<String, List<String>> collect = devsiteNameList.stream().collect(Collectors.groupingBy(e -> e));
        ArrayList<Map<String, Object>> objects = new ArrayList<>();
        collect.forEach((k, v) -> {
            Map<String, Object> resultMap = new HashMap<>();
            resultMap.put("devsite_name", k);
            resultMap.put("alarmCount", v.size());
            objects.add(resultMap);
        });
        List<Map<String, Object>> collect1 = objects.stream().sorted(Comparator.comparing(ZouPingWeek::getMapValueByAlarmCount).reversed()).limit(2).collect(Collectors.toList());
        List<Map<String, Object>> resultListMap = Lists.newArrayList();
        HashMap<String, Object> objectObjectHashMap = new HashMap<>();
        if (collect1.size() == 2) {
            objectObjectHashMap.put("firstDevsiteName", collect1.get(0).get("devsite_name"));
            objectObjectHashMap.put("firstAlarmCount", collect1.get(0).get("alarmCount"));
            objectObjectHashMap.put("secondDevsiteName", collect1.get(1).get("devsite_name"));
            objectObjectHashMap.put("secondAlarmCount", collect1.get(1).get("alarmCount"));
        } else if (collect1.size() == 1) {
            objectObjectHashMap.put("firstDevsiteName", collect1.get(0).get("devsite_name"));
            objectObjectHashMap.put("firstAlarmCount", collect1.get(0).get("alarmCount"));
            objectObjectHashMap.put("secondDevsiteName", "");
            objectObjectHashMap.put("secondAlarmCount", "");
        } else {
            objectObjectHashMap.put("firstDevsiteName", "");
            objectObjectHashMap.put("firstAlarmCount", "");
            objectObjectHashMap.put("secondDevsiteName", "");
            objectObjectHashMap.put("secondAlarmCount", "");
        }
        resultListMap.add(objectObjectHashMap);
        return resultListMap;
    }


    public void pointRealTimeAlarmStatisticsParagraph(String startTime, String endTime, XWPFDocument docx, LocalDateTime today) throws Exception {
        Map<String, String> textMap = new HashMap<>();
        int PM25 = getJsonElements(startTime, endTime, "134004").size();
        int TVOC = getJsonElements(startTime, endTime, "199054").size();
        String primaryPollute = "";
        Integer primaryCount = 0;
        if (PM25 > TVOC) {
            primaryPollute = "PM2.5";
            primaryCount = PM25;
        } else {
            primaryPollute = "TVOC";
            primaryCount = TVOC;
        }

        int weekTotal = PM25 + TVOC;

        String startDateTimeStr = DateUtil.formatDate(LocalDateTimeUtil.parse(startTime, DatePattern.NORM_DATETIME_PATTERN).minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy-MM-dd 00:00:00");
        String endDateTimeStr = DateUtil.formatDate(LocalDateTimeUtil.parse(endTime, DatePattern.NORM_DATETIME_PATTERN).minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "yyyy-MM-dd 23:59:59");
        int lastPM25 = getJsonElements(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, "134004").size();
        int lastTVOC = getJsonElements(startDateTimeStr, endDateTimeStr, "199054").size();
        int lastWeekTotal = lastPM25 + lastTVOC;
        String compareCountStr = "";
        if (weekTotal > lastWeekTotal) {
            compareCountStr = "增加" + Math.abs(weekTotal - lastWeekTotal) + "次";
        } else {
            compareCountStr = "减少" + Math.abs(weekTotal - lastWeekTotal) + "次";
        }

        String dateTime = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy年M月d日") + "-" +
                DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "M月d日");
        String template = "{}，邹平市有效点位实时报警共计{}次，环比上上周{}。报警类型主要为{}({}次），详情如下：";
        String format = StrUtil.format(template, dateTime, weekTotal, compareCountStr, primaryPollute, primaryCount);
        textMap.put("pointRealTimeAlarmStr", format);
        ExportCharts.doParagraphs(docx, textMap);
    }



    //获取热点网格报警统计的数据
    public JsonArray getRealTimeAlarmTaskUrl(String startTime, String endTime, String pollutant_id, String eventTypeId) throws Exception {
        String url = "https://api-daily-supervision.airqualitychina.cn/api/events";
        JsonObject jsonParams = new JsonObject();
        jsonParams.addProperty("token", "qiYrxXEv5mJPW6-dU5_wQTjc31YSd3d0hOpz0MBxkyGi23A8iCQG_TwWsu1qDcoIWwZt9jr0aGPuLtiWRZ8ewq_D14tsI6EtCtiyOgxa4CXtooG7cdPZa3VN27bCfNSFeqKF3m5q3-CMcmJSbFTyKIQU83Q16pkCd7jQ6DVoKfFrz-VwB-_VIIPZeKTIZfAYmtQwnePQUKRdI-mtURPkHSZP6zfQtrihLJZolCCKgOKlBz4Fz-Wcf5hl7wWfQkl_fzU_Hszgcwm5h4y9xdHyYQ==");
        jsonParams.addProperty("devsite_prop_code", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("event_status", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("pollutant_id", pollutant_id);
        jsonParams.addProperty("adm_id", "23906");
        jsonParams.addProperty("adm_level", "3");
        jsonParams.addProperty("page", 1);
        jsonParams.addProperty("page_size", 1000000);
        jsonParams.addProperty("start_datetime", startTime);
        jsonParams.addProperty("end_datetime", endTime);
        jsonParams.addProperty("event_type_id", eventTypeId);
        jsonParams.addProperty("project_code", "153");
        jsonParams.addProperty("feedback_status", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("subgrid_code", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("is_pushed", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("fugitive_code", "");
        JsonObject jsonObject = Information.sendHttpGet(url, jsonParams);
        JsonArray resultArray = jsonObject.getAsJsonObject().get("result").getAsJsonArray();
        return resultArray;
    }

    //获取点位实时报警统计的数据
    public JsonArray getJsonElements(String startTime, String endTime, String pollutantId) throws Exception {
        String url = "https://api-daily-supervision.airqualitychina.cn/api/events";
        JsonObject jsonParams = new JsonObject();
        jsonParams.addProperty("token", "qiYrxXEv5mJPW6-dU5_wQeB5hsU7_lZZMefyJrQbWxmi23A8iCQG_TwWsu1qDcoIWwZt9jr0aGPuLtiWRZ8ewq_D14tsI6EtCtiyOgxa4CXtooG7cdPZa3VN27bCfNSFeqKF3m5q3-CMcmJSbFTyKIQU83Q16pkCd7jQ6DVoKfFrz-VwB-_VIIPZeKTIZfAYmtQwnePQUKRdI-mtURPkHSZP6zfQtrihLJZolCCKgOKlBz4Fz-Wcf5hl7wWfQkl_fzU_Hszgcwm5h4y9xdHyYQ==");
        jsonParams.addProperty("devsite_prop_code", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("event_status", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("pollutant_id", pollutantId);
        jsonParams.addProperty("adm_id", "23906");
        jsonParams.addProperty("adm_level", 3);
        jsonParams.addProperty("page", 1);
        jsonParams.addProperty("page_size", 100000);
        jsonParams.addProperty("start_datetime", startTime);
        jsonParams.addProperty("end_datetime", endTime);
        jsonParams.addProperty("event_type_id", "3");
        jsonParams.addProperty("project_code", "153");
        jsonParams.addProperty("feedback_status", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("subgrid_code", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("grid_code", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("is_pushed", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("fugitive_code", "");
        jsonParams.addProperty("chaoyang_is_transferred", "");
        JsonObject jsonObject = Information.sendHttpGet(url, jsonParams);
        return jsonObject.getAsJsonObject().get("result").getAsJsonArray();
    }


    public String cityControlledStationStr(LocalDateTime today, Integer weekCount, Boolean isBeforeYear, Integer lastYearCount, String polluteType, Boolean isLimitRank, Integer limitCount, Integer order) throws Exception {
        // 先查出第一个元素集合取出站点成为第一个集合
        // 查出第二个元素集合取出站点成为第二个集合
        // 遍历第一个元素集合，拿出集合中第一个元素然后判断第二个集合中是否包含，包含的话就加一，然后获取第三个集合，在判断，知道没有，然后拿出第一个集合的第二个元素，重复此步骤
        List<Map<String, Object>> sevenDayFirstMaps = getMaps(today, weekCount, isBeforeYear, lastYearCount, polluteType, isLimitRank, limitCount, order);
        ArrayList<String> stringFirst = new ArrayList<>();
        List<Map<String, String>> finallyList = new ArrayList<>();
        for (Map<String, Object> sevenDayMap : sevenDayFirstMaps) {
            String stationName = sevenDayMap.get("stationName").toString();
            stringFirst.add(stationName);
        }
        // 定义一个计数器
        int count = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < stringFirst.size(); i++) {
            List<Map<String, Object>> stationList = getMaps(today, weekCount + 1, isBeforeYear, lastYearCount, polluteType, isLimitRank, limitCount, order);
            boolean flag = true;
            int j = weekCount + 1;
            while (flag) {
                ArrayList<String> stringStation = new ArrayList<>();
                for (Map<String, Object> sevenDayMap : stationList) {
                    String stationName = sevenDayMap.get("stationName").toString();
                    stringStation.add(stationName);
                }
					/*判断元素在不在下一个集合里面，在的话flag为true,然后集合stationList为下下一个集合的，依次类推，知道不存在，flag为false,count重置
					此时i++,进入第一个集合里面下一个元素是否连续的判断*/
                if (stringStation.contains(stringFirst.get(i))) {
                    count++;
                    stationList = getMaps(today, j++, isBeforeYear, lastYearCount, polluteType, isLimitRank, limitCount, order);
                } else {
                    // 这边要在不包含里面添加数据，以为要是在包含里面添加数据只能添加包含的数据，再else里面包含数据多加了一，所以要减掉，但是不包含不能为负的,
                    Map<String, String> stringIntegerHashMap = new HashMap<>();
                    int num = 0;
                    if (count - 1 == -1) {
                        num = 0;
                    } else {
                        num = count - 1;
                    }
                    stringIntegerHashMap.put("stationName", stringFirst.get(i));
                    stringIntegerHashMap.put("count", num + "");
                    finallyList.add(stringIntegerHashMap);
                    flag = false;
                    count = 0;
                }
            }
        }
        String templateStr="";
        String dateTime = DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.MONDAY), "yyyy年M月d日") + "-" +
                DateUtil.formatDate(today.minusWeeks(1).with(DayOfWeek.SUNDAY), "M月d日");
        if("SO2".equals(polluteType)){
            String start=dateTime+"，"+"邹平市各站点SO2指标排名靠后的是";
            for (int i = 0; i <finallyList.size() ; i++) {
                if(finallyList.get(i).get("count").equals("0")){
                    start=start+finallyList.get(i).get("stationName");
                    if(i!=finallyList.size()-1){
                        start=start+"、";
                    }
                }else{
                    start=start+finallyList.get(i).get("stationName")+"(连续"+ NumberChineseFormatter.format(Double.parseDouble(finallyList.get(i).get("count")), false, false)+"周)";
                    if(i!=finallyList.size()-1){
                        start=start+"、";
                    }
                }
            }
            templateStr=start+"；";
        }else if("NO2".equals(polluteType)){
            String start = "NO2指标排名靠后的是";
            for (int i = 0; i <finallyList.size() ; i++) {
                if (finallyList.get(i).get("count").equals("0")) {
                    start = start + finallyList.get(i).get("stationName");
                    if (i != finallyList.size() - 1) {
                        start = start + "、";
                    }
                } else {
                    start = start + finallyList.get(i).get("stationName") + "(连续" + NumberChineseFormatter.format(Double.parseDouble(finallyList.get(i).get("count")), false, false) + "周)";
                    if (i != finallyList.size() - 1) {
                        start = start + "、";
                    }
                }
            }
            templateStr = start + "。";
        }else if("PM2.5".equals(polluteType)) {
            String start=dateTime+"，"+"邹平市各站点PM2.5指标排名靠后的是";
            for (int i = 0; i <finallyList.size() ; i++) {
                if(finallyList.get(i).get("count").equals("0")){
                    start=start+finallyList.get(i).get("stationName");
                    if(i!=finallyList.size()-1){
                        start=start+"、";
                    }
                }else{
                    start=start+finallyList.get(i).get("stationName")+"(连续"+ NumberChineseFormatter.format(Double.parseDouble(finallyList.get(i).get("count")), false, false)+"周)";
                    if(i!=finallyList.size()-1){
                        start=start+"、";
                    }
                }
            }
            templateStr=start+"；";
        }else if("PM10".equals(polluteType)){
            String start = "PM10指标排名靠后的是";
            for (int i = 0; i <finallyList.size() ; i++) {
                if (finallyList.get(i).get("count").equals("0")) {
                    start = start + finallyList.get(i).get("stationName");
                    if (i != finallyList.size() - 1) {
                        start = start + "、";
                    }
                } else {
                    start = start + finallyList.get(i).get("stationName") + "(连续" + NumberChineseFormatter.format(Double.parseDouble(finallyList.get(i).get("count")), false, false) + "周)";
                    if (i != finallyList.size() - 1) {
                        start = start + "、";
                    }
                }
            }
            templateStr = start + "。";
        }else if("CO".equals(polluteType)) {
            String start=dateTime+"，"+"邹平市各站点CO指标排名靠后的是";
            for (int i = 0; i <finallyList.size() ; i++) {
                if(finallyList.get(i).get("count").equals("0")){
                    start=start+finallyList.get(i).get("stationName");
                    if(i!=finallyList.size()-1){
                        start=start+"、";
                    }
                }else{
                    start=start+finallyList.get(i).get("stationName")+"(连续"+ NumberChineseFormatter.format(Double.parseDouble(finallyList.get(i).get("count")), false, false)+"周)";
                    if(i!=finallyList.size()-1){
                        start=start+"、";
                    }
                }
            }
            templateStr=start+"；";
        }else if("O3".equals(polluteType)){
            String start = "O3指标排名靠后的是";
            for (int i = 0; i <finallyList.size() ; i++) {
                if (finallyList.get(i).get("count").equals("0")) {
                    start = start + finallyList.get(i).get("stationName");
                    if (i != finallyList.size() - 1) {
                        start = start + "、";
                    }
                } else {
                    start = start + finallyList.get(i).get("stationName") + "(连续" + NumberChineseFormatter.format(Double.parseDouble(finallyList.get(i).get("count")), false, false) + "周)";
                    if (i != finallyList.size() - 1) {
                        start = start + "、";
                    }
                }
            }
            templateStr = start + "。";
        }
        return templateStr;
    }
    public List<Map<String, Object>> getMaps (LocalDateTime today, Integer weekCount, Boolean isBeforeYear, Integer
            lastYearCount, String polluteType, Boolean isLimitRank, Integer limitCount, Integer order) throws Exception {
        return new ZouPingWeek().cityControlledStation(today, weekCount, isBeforeYear, lastYearCount, polluteType, isLimitRank, limitCount, order);
    }


    public void concentrationOnSixIndicators(LocalDateTime today, Integer weekCount, Boolean isBeforeYear, Integer lastYearCount, String starterFormatter, String endFormatter) throws Exception {
        // 上周的数据
        lastSixIndicators(today,1,false,0,"M月d日", "M月d日");
        // 上上周的

    }
}
